HTML/JavaScript/JQuery/node.js.Experience in Multi-threaded application development and inter-process communication.Experience with networking protocols, messaging libraries, and socket programming.Agile development methodology experience, especially with Scrum and Atlassian tools like Jira.Strong written, communication, troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.Please send resumes to dheaton@levelupforce.com or call Dana Heaton at 202-270-8083LevelUp Force is an Equal Opportunity EmployerLevelUp Force was created to bring you best-in-breed information technology staffing experience...information technology staffing by IT professionals. ['Software engineer working on the Runkeeper product on iOS, Android and the web. Daily job duties include writing code to develop new features, fixing high priority software bugs, writing automated tests, participating in scrum meetings and mentoring junior developers.', 'Experience may be gained concurrently. ', 'Experience must include four years of source control experience with Git. ', 'Experience must include one year each of the following: Objective-C/Swift, iOS development, JavaScript and web development, Dev-ops including continuous integration environments and deploying and managing services. ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field and five years of experience in the job offered or five years software development. ', 'Responsibilities ', 'Experience must include three years each of the following: Java, Android development, Database and SQL, and Back-end server development. ', ' Requirements ', 'Experience must include five years working as part of a scrum team using Jira. ', 'Daily job duties include writing code to develop new features, fixing high priority software bugs, writing automated tests, participating in scrum meetings and mentoring junior developers.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field and five years of experience in the job offered or five years software development. Experience must include five years working as part of a scrum team using Jira. Experience must include four years of source control experience with Git. Experience must include three years each of the following: Java, Android development, Database and SQL, and Back-end server development. Experience must include one year each of the following: Objective-C/Swift, iOS development, JavaScript and web development, Dev-ops including continuous integration environments and deploying and managing services. Experience may be gained concurrently. ', 'Software engineer working on the Runkeeper product on iOS, Android and the web. ']

'Experience as a Software Engineer is desired.', 'Certified Cloud Security Professional (CSSP)', 'Solid understanding of a wide variety of information security architectures, concepts and techniques, as well as supporting security tools.', 'AWS Certified Security', 'Solid understanding in common web application vulnerabilities and malware techniques.', 'Certified Information Systems Security breadth through experience in the IT industry.', 'Experience with Consulting and engineering in the development and design of security best practices and implementation of solid security principles ['', 'Preferred Skills/exp', 'Must be able to work independently/no 3rd parties Seeking a Big Data Data Engineer to design, develop and document microservice and system components consisting of several objects working together to execute a business function of the larger system. Interact with software architects or other business/technical leaders to understand subsystems, component specifications and recommend changes to facilitate efficient and effective development. Interact with representatives of other cross functional teams to understand and/or recommend requirements and strategies for the project.As a Big Data Engineer You WouldWork with the business and IT team to understand business problems, and to design, implement, and deliver an appropriate solution using agile methodology across the larger program.Develops code and test artifacts that reuse subroutines or objects, is well structured, backed by automated tests, includes sufficient comments and is easy to maintain.Work independently to implement solutions on multiple platform (DEV, QA, UAT, PROD).Provide technical direction, leadership, and reviews to other engineers working on the same project.Implement and debug subsystems/microservice and components.Participate in integrated test sessions of components and subsystems on test and production servers.Follows automate-first/automate-everything philosophy.Determine and communicate the implications of system-level decisions on subsystems and components and help determine how best to mitigate or take advantage of these implications.Perform tasks efficiently and work together with team to ensure project success.Support management of the team’s technical infrastructure (e.g., repository, build system, testing system) under guidance from the systems engineer or another project leader.Hands on in multiple programming paradigms, Object Oriented, etc.Skills/expAt least 5 yrs of IT-Software/Software product developmentBachelor of Science-Computer Science or equivalent.Exp with Data Engineering languages and technologies - AWS Glue, Python, PySpark, Spark, Informatica, Git and Jenkins CI.SQL Server, Oracle, PostgreSQL and stored procedures.AWS Technologies - S3, AWS Glue, RDS, lambda and cloud watchDW concepts.Apache Kafka & Spark Streaming is nice to have.Preferred Skills/expExp across programming languages, patterns and data structures.Adequate hands on exp with data modeling, locks, database concurrency.Applied knowledge of Object Orientated programming concept (OOPS), Operating System (OS) concept.Proficient with software architecture, design patterns and strong demonstrated exp in building frameworks.Strong computer science background including distributed computing.Good knowledge of software development tools and methodologies.Good knowledge of secure coding practices is a plus.Thorough understanding and hands-on experience in the development of all layers of enterprise applications to analyze system scalability, integration, and performance issues as well as internationalization utilizing either Unicode and/or multi-byte databases.Good exposure of software development life cycle, development process flow and their tools usage.Must be aware of agile, incremental or spiral development methodology.Excellent diagnostic and troubleshooting skills, problem solving, and an ability to learn quickly.Domain knowledge in financial services is a plus.Good communication skill to articulate views/thoughts with team and partners or customers without any gap.Willingness and ability to learn new technologies.Expert knowledge of computer languages, data structures, program design methods and techniques.Ability to troubleshoot complex problems systematically.Self-motivated, thorough, and methodical.Overall knowledge of the computing environment at large, e.g. typical uses and user populations of operating systems, communications protocols, hardware platforms, etc.', 'Skills/exp', 'As a Big Data Engineer You Would']

job_title: Sr. Manager, Data Engineer - Data Warehouse/Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Build dashboards and reports using BI tools (Tableau, PowerBI)', '  BS/BA Degree with 5-7 years of related experience in data management or analysis. Ability to decipher and organize large amounts of data. An analytical mindset with superb communication and problem-solving skills. Ability to translate complex problems clearly and in nontechnical terms. In-depth SQL programming knowledge - partitioning, indexing, performance tuning knowledge, stored procedure, views Knowledge in various Azure PAAS offerings e.g. ADLS, Azure BLOB, Batch Service, Key Vaults, etc. Knowledge of computer system validation, 21CFR Part11, and HIPAA regulations. Excellent communications, problem-solving and organizational skills. Must be a self-starter and have the ability to drive results. Resourceful and innovative, willing to think “out of the box” when developing solutions. ', 'Provide functional and technical support to the business and functional areas.', 'Develop and implement procedures for effective data management.', 'Position Summary', 'Ability to decipher and organize large amounts of data.', 'Ability to translate complex problems clearly and in nontechnical terms.', 'Assist with recognizing and upholding digital security systems to protect delicate information.', 'Resourceful and innovative, willing to think “out of the box” when developing solutions.', 'Excellent communications, problem-solving and organizational skills.', 'Regularly monitor and evaluate information and data systems that could affect analytical results.', ' Develop and implement procedures for effective data management. Advise the company about tools, data sources, and best practices to facilitate digital marketing, pricing, and web analytics Regularly monitor and evaluate information and data systems that could affect analytical results. Assess system performance and make recommendations for software, hardware, and data storage improvements. Manage all incoming data files. Continually develop data management strategies. Build dashboards and reports using BI tools (Tableau, PowerBI) Assist with recognizing and upholding digital security systems to protect delicate information. Provide functional and technical support to the business and functional areas. Gather requirements from business stakeholders, translate those requirements into technical implementation plans and execute plans to provide technology solutions. Ensure project documentation and protocols follow Computer System Validation Lifecycle Management, when appropriate. Ability to use strong industry knowledge to relate to customer needs and dissolve customer concerns and a high level of focus and attention to detail. As a member of the IT organization at MannKind Corp., the incumbent is also expected to be customer-focused, a problem solver, a communicator, professional, willing to learn, organized, and a team player. Duties and responsibilities are not limited to the work listed above and may include other assignments as necessary. ['', 'Experience with real-time control systems is beneficial.', 'Experience with Git and/or Subversion for source control. ', "C++ development experience for lower level software is desired. AZAD Technology Partners is looking for bright, talented, flexible, and customer centric problem solvers who enjoy the challenges associated with solving the most complex problems by utilizing the most sophisticated technologies and strong people skills. Founded and managed by technologists and engineers, AZAD is a leading provider of Technology Consulting and Engineering Solutions to Fortune 500 and innovative high-tech firms since 1992. AZAD works closely with its clients to solve their most complex technological challenges. Join AZAD's professional team and enhance your career by being engaged with some of the most innovative projects in the Pacific Northwest. AZAD's model provides a unique employment experience that is career path focused, relationship based and dedication to advocacy and retention with an average tenure of 8 years. Our collaborative approach to support our clients, projects and our passion about technology is key to our success. If you enjoy working in such an environment, we encourage you to apply. EXCELLENT EMPLOYEE BENEFITS including Co-paid Medical, Dental and Vision Insurance, Cafeteria Plan, Paid Sick Leave, 401K Plan, Credit Union Membership, and Referral Bonus. U.S. Citizens and those authorized to work in the U.S. are encouraged to apply AZAD Technology Partners is an equal opportunity employer that considers and employs qualified individuals based upon job related qualifications regardless of race, color, sex, religion, creed, physical or mental disability, veteran's status, sexual orientation, national origin, age or any other status protected under applicable local, state or federal law. AZAD Technology Partners takes affirmative action to employ and advance in employment qualified employees and applicants who are disabled, disabled veterans, recently separated veterans, Armed Forces services medal veterans, and other protected veterans.", 'Experience writing software for hardware (i.e. product development, software for control of hardware, machine control etc.). ', 'Ability to be a resourceful problem solver and enjoys working side-by-side achieved engineers to deliver dynamic software projects. ']

job_title: Sr Associate Software Development Engineer in Test
job_text: ['Perform numerical validation of algorithms including independent coding, cross-validation with existing SAS products or third-party products, equivalence, simulation, or predictive performance.', 'Automate regression testing on all applicable platforms and maintain benchmarks.', 'Experience creating automation scripts.', 'Ability to resolve problems with varying management assistance, escalating when appropriate.', 'Review software documentation and provide feedback.', 'Experience with creating test data for test execution and data integrity verification.', 'Experience with DevOps and Continuous Delivery.', 'Solid understanding of software testing tools, methodologies and principles.', 'Communicate with developers, product marketing managers, and industry experts to define testing strategies and coverage.', "Professional knowledge in at least one analytical discipline, or advanced knowledge in several analytical disciplines. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. Master’s degree is preferred.Ability to program in one or more programming languages, such as Python, R, SAS IML, Java, C++, Shell ScriptExperience with creating test data for test execution and data integrity verification.Experience creating automation scripts.Ability to participate in all steps of the continuous development lifecycle; including design, development, testing, and monitoring Demonstrated aptitude for problem solving and debugging of complex multi-tiered software applications; ability to develop creative solutions to complex technical problems. Ability to handle deadlines in multi-tasking environment.Ability to quickly learn new technical skills.Ability to work independently with minimal guidance on day-to-day work and new projects or assignmentsStrong written and verbal communication skillsYou’re curious, passionate, authentic and accountable. These are our\xa0values\xa0and influence everything we do.", 'You’re curious, passionate, authentic and accountable. These are our\xa0values\xa0and influence everything we do.', 'Exercise analytical methodologies to test and validate statistical algorithms and analytical software.Perform numerical validation of algorithms including independent coding, cross-validation with existing SAS products or third-party products, equivalence, simulation, or predictive performance.Plan, document, and perform functional, validation, and systematic testing for new and existing software and analyticsDesign, implement, and continuously improve automated test frameworks, tools, and scripts that address specific needs in a continuous deployment pipeline Report defects, evaluate fix requests, and verify fixes.Automate regression testing on all applicable platforms and maintain benchmarks.Review software design during development stage and provide feedback to developers.Stay current with analytical methodologies by researching literature and participating in courses or conferences.Communicate with developers, product marketing managers, and industry experts to define testing strategies and coverage.Review software documentation and provide feedback.Assist Tech Support and consultants in resolving customer issues.Keep current with SAS internal testing methodologies and approaches; regularly evaluate third-party tools/solutions.', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills', '\xa0', 'Stay current with analytical methodologies by researching literature and participating in courses or conferences.', 'Ability to participate in all steps of the continuous development lifecycle; including design, development, testing, and monitoring ', 'As a Sr. Associate Software Development Engineer in Test at SAS in the Cyber Analytics R&D division (CAR), you will work closely with the SAS Talon Data Science and Engineering teams. You will be responsible for software testing activities, throughout the software release cycle. You will numerically validate and compare with the state-of-the-art algorithms developed by SAS for analyzing network telemetry data. You will have to keep up with the current research and write prototype versions of the algorithms for testing purposes. You will work with limited requirements or design specifications to create unique test cases in accordance with criteria reflecting real customer environments. You will work with cross functional team members to review test design and test cases. You will work with test team members to write automation scripts and automated test cases. You will also create test data to test customer use cases.', 'All valid SAS job openings are located on the Careers page at www.sas.com. SAS only sends emails from verified “sas.com” email addresses and never asks for sensitive, personal information or money. Should you have any doubts about the authenticity of any type of communication from for, or on behalf of SAS, please contact us at Recruitingsupport@sas.com before taking any further action.', 'If so, then you may be the new team member we’re looking for. Because at SAS, your curiosity matters - whether you’re developing algorithms, creating customer experiences or answering critical questions. Curiosity is our code, and the opportunities here are endless.\xa0', 'What we do\xa0\xa0', 'What you’ll do', 'Ability to quickly learn new technical skills.', 'Ability to handle deadlines in multi-tasking environment.', 'Plan, document, and perform functional, validation, and systematic testing for new and existing software and analytics', 'Want to stay up to date with life at SAS, products and jobs? Follow us on LinkedIn\xa0\xa0', "Equivalent combination of education, training and experience may be considered in place of the above qualifications. The level of this position will be determined based on the applicant's education, skills and experience.\xa0Resumes may be considered in the order they are received.\xa0SAS employees performing certain job functions may require access to technology or software subject to export or import regulations. To comply with these regulations, SAS may obtain nationality or citizenship information from applicants for employment. SAS collects this information solely for trade law compliance purposes and does not use it to discriminate unfairly in the hiring process.", 'Report defects, evaluate fix requests, and verify fixes.', 'Other knowledge, skills, and abilities:', 'Knowledge of SAS products and their applications.', 'Are you a problem solver, explorer, and knowledge seeker - always asking, “What if?”\xa0', 'Knowledge of third-party products.', 'We love living the #SASlife and believe that happy, healthy people have a passion for life, and bring that energy to work. No matter what your specialty or where you are in the world, your unique contributions will make a difference.\xa0', 'Ability to communicate with people of various technical backgrounds, think analytically, write and edit technical material, and the ability to write and present clearly on technical matters in a business context.Ability to resolve problems with varying management assistance, escalating when appropriate.Ability to understand business requirements and translate into technical solutions.Ability to learn, retain, grow and apply business and technical knowledge.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. Master’s degree is preferred.", 'Background in one of the following areas: outlier/anomaly detection, dimension reduction or streaming analytics.', 'Demonstrated aptitude for problem solving and debugging of complex multi-tiered software applications; ability to develop creative solutions to complex technical problems. ', 'What we’re looking for:', 'You will:', 'Our multi-dimensional culture blends our different backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. Here, it isn’t about fitting into our culture, it’s about adding to it - and we can’t wait to see what you’ll bring.', 'Professional knowledge in at least one analytical discipline, or advanced knowledge in several analytical disciplines. ', 'Ability to program in one or more programming languages, such as Python, R, SAS IML, Java, C++, Shell Script', 'Why SAS', 'To qualify, applicants must be legally authorized to work in the United States, and should not require, now or in the future, sponsorship for employment visa status. SAS is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants are considered for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law. Read more:\xa0Equal Employment Opportunity is the Law. Also view the supplement\xa0EEO is the Law, and the Pay Transparency notice.\xa0', 'We love living the #SASlife and believe that happy, healthy people have a passion for life, and bring that energy to work. No matter what your specialty or where you are in the world, your unique contributions will make a difference.\xa0Our multi-dimensional culture blends our different backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. Here, it isn’t about fitting into our culture, it’s about adding to it - and we can’t wait to see what you’ll bring.', 'We’re the leader in analytics.\xa0 Through our software and services, we inspire customers around the world to transform data into intelligence.\xa0 Our curiosity fuels innovation, pushing boundaries, challenging the status quo and changing the way we live.\xa0 We are seeking an innovative and dedicated individual to join our Cybersecurity practice as a Sr. Associate Software Development Engineer in Test.', 'Review software design during development stage and provide feedback to developers.', 'Ability to communicate with people of various technical backgrounds, think analytically, write and edit technical material, and the ability to write and present clearly on technical matters in a business context.', 'Ability to understand business requirements and translate into technical solutions.', 'The nice to haves:', 'Background in one of the following areas: outlier/anomaly detection, dimension reduction or streaming analytics.Experience with DevOps and Continuous Delivery.Solid understanding of software testing tools, methodologies and principles.Knowledge of SAS products and their applications.Knowledge of third-party products.', 'Additional Information:', 'Keep current with SAS internal testing methodologies and approaches; regularly evaluate third-party tools/solutions.', 'Assist Tech Support and consultants in resolving customer issues.', 'Ability to learn, retain, grow and apply business and technical knowledge.', 'Design, implement, and continuously improve automated test frameworks, tools, and scripts that address specific needs in a continuous deployment pipeline ', 'Ability to work independently with minimal guidance on day-to-day work and new projects or assignments', 'Exercise analytical methodologies to test and validate statistical algorithms and analytical software.']

You can be a part of building the digital economy of tomorrow and radically transforming our society for the better. A dynamic startup environment with deep roots. job_title: Wholesale Payments Data and Analytics Product Owner - Vice President
job_text: ['', ' Skill Requirements: ', 'Executive presence and presentation skills', 'Manage and deliver projects through the entire life-cycle to include scoping, structuring and analytical resolution. Reach to develop frameworks for addressing business challenges through data', "3+ years' experience in product management", 'Drive the right kind of decision-making into technical development. Marrying analytical needs with client empathy is critical to succeeding in this role', 'Understand the end customer of products/solutions delivered and keep a customer first mindset translated in to the work and priorities', ' Experience Requirements: ', 'Skilled facilitator and strong relationship builder', 'Hybrid at your core - combine deep strategic and business insight with a quantitative background and client empathy. This is an incredible opportunity for hybrid thinkers that love to learn and synthesize in a high-performing culture.', 'Work with smart and accomplished teammates who have the experience, talent, skills and personalities to create data products that are developed with people in mind. You will represent a different way of working -human-centered - iterative - collaborating in small multidisciplinary teams', 'Proven strategic thinking and creative problem solving skills with ability to translate strategy into tactical plans', 'Proven ability to develop relationships with a wide array of partners, executives and customers', 'Experience in the payments industry and/or technology-enabled industries is preferred', 'Manage an interdisciplinary team of data engineer, data visualization designers, functional leads and control partners to roll-out an interactive analytics solution to market.', 'Consulting orientation ability to influence both internal & external business partners.', 'Ability for rapid prototyping (in Excel, Tableau); understanding of SQL, Python, R is a key benefit', 'Project manage and communicate progress on a regular cadence (e.g., weekly) to senior leaders and escalate issues early; set up for effective product implementation', 'MBA/Masters/PHD required', 'Strong interpersonal and communication skills, ability to work across functions as well as with outside parties to ensure alignment and timely implementation of initiatives', 'The role', 'Understanding "deep data" environments, ideally with a Merchant mindset', 'Synthesizing data sets to streamlined, clear and actionable messages', 'Experience with creating business initiatives and communicate ideas with a digitally focused and data driven mindset', 'Serve as a strategic partner to key business leaders and develop strong, on-going consultative relationships with stakeholders. Work with partners on projects driving towards a vision of a fully data empowered organization', 'Strong management and leadership skills, including demonstrated success leading organization through significant change to achieve results', 'Wholesale Payments Data & Analytics- Product Owner, Vice President', 'Manage an interdisciplinary team of data engineer, data visualization designers, functional leads and control partners to roll-out an interactive analytics solution to market. Drive the right kind of decision-making into technical development. Marrying analytical needs with client empathy is critical to succeeding in this role Establish agile practices to ensure that the product is being built effectively and in a timely fashion Project manage and communicate progress on a regular cadence (e.g., weekly) to senior leaders and escalate issues early; set up for effective product implementation Work with smart and accomplished teammates who have the experience, talent, skills and personalities to create data products that are developed with people in mind. You will represent a different way of working -human-centered - iterative - collaborating in small multidisciplinary teams After launch, ensure maintenance of product, understand features to develop, manage roadmap of enhancements Understand the end customer of products/solutions delivered and keep a customer first mindset translated in to the work and priorities Manage and deliver projects through the entire life-cycle to include scoping, structuring and analytical resolution. Reach to develop frameworks for addressing business challenges through data Serve as a strategic partner to key business leaders and develop strong, on-going consultative relationships with stakeholders. Work with partners on projects driving towards a vision of a fully data empowered organization ', 'Who we are? ', 'Job Description', 'Why join?', "MBA/Masters/PHD required Consulting orientation ability to influence both internal & external business partners. 3+ years' experience in product management 5+ years' experience in top tier management consulting or equivalent work experience Experience with agile practices to develop products Experience in the payments industry and/or technology-enabled industries is preferred Proven experience leading large teams in an advanced analytical environment Proven experience with emerging technologies related to insights (e.g., Tableau) Ability for rapid prototyping (in Excel, Tableau); understanding of SQL, Python, R is a key benefit Synthesizing data sets to streamlined, clear and actionable messages Experience with creating business initiatives and communicate ideas with a digitally focused and data driven mindset Proven ability to develop relationships with a wide array of partners, executives and customers ", 'After launch, ensure maintenance of product, understand features to develop, manage roadmap of enhancements', 'The Wholesale Payments Data & Analytics ', 'Establish agile practices to ensure that the product is being built effectively and in a timely fashion', 'High achievement orientation with ability to lead and motivate others around results', 'Proven experience leading large teams in an advanced analytical environment', 'Ability to build trust-based relationships', 'Strong aptitude for technical concepts and ideas', 'Ability to work well within deadlines', 'Proven experience with emerging technologies related to insights (e.g., Tableau)', "5+ years' experience in top tier management consulting or equivalent work experience", 'Strong management and leadership skills, including demonstrated success leading organization through significant change to achieve results Hybrid at your core - combine deep strategic and business insight with a quantitative background and client empathy. This is an incredible opportunity for hybrid thinkers that love to learn and synthesize in a high-performing culture. Strong interpersonal and communication skills, ability to work across functions as well as with outside parties to ensure alignment and timely implementation of initiatives Ability to build trust-based relationships Proven strategic thinking and creative problem solving skills with ability to translate strategy into tactical plans Strong aptitude for technical concepts and ideas Ability to work well within deadlines Executive presence and presentation skills Strong written and oral communication skills Skilled facilitator and strong relationship builder Understanding "deep data" environments, ideally with a Merchant mindset High achievement orientation with ability to lead and motivate others around results ', 'Experience with agile practices to develop products', 'Strong written and oral communication skills']

job_text: ['', ' Strong Technical knowledge implementing, supporting, and troubleshooting other technology areas such as SAN, Backup Recovery, Switch, Cloud (Azure), Security technologies and VDI is a plus.', ' Develop and present compelling business cases to customers and maintain expert-level knowledge of all elements of the business case (drivers of cost, benefit, and risk).', 'Description & Requirements', ' Maintain knowledge of complex industry trends, current data center trends and technologies and update management on risk and threat that could impact company business.', ' You have industry knowledge and years of technology experience to aid in technical selling, explaining features and benefits to customers-and crafting and configuring products to meet specific customer needs', ' A systems architect with 8+ years-related experience preferred; BS/BA (EE/CS) a plus. Passionate about the customer experience and excited about new technology, along with a do-what-it-takes demeanor about customer success. HPE server and storage solutions experience preferred. Cisco UCS experience preferred Strong Virtualization expertise in VMware solutions is preferred. Strong Technical knowledge implementing, supporting, and troubleshooting other technology areas such as SAN, Backup Recovery, Switch, Cloud (Azure), Security technologies and VDI is a plus. Knowledge of current Windows Server versions, current client operating systems, network protocols, routing, switching and firewalls. Comprehensive understanding of anti-virus and backup solutions. Knowledgeable of baseline SE skills and in-depth knowledge in data center products/licensing. Experienced in relevant solutions sets, product line specifications, performance criteria and applications. Programming experience a plus. Manufacturer related certification(s) with: Cisco, HPE, VMware, Dell/EMC,and/or equivalent experience and the desire to become one a plus. job_text: ['', 'Experience working with Docker development and deployment workflows', 'Chief data scientist:', 'R&D:', 'Experience working on Behavior Biometrics and anomaly detection/fraud related usecases is a plus', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Essential Functions', 'Mental/Physical Requirements ', 'Demonstrated expertise and experience with advanced and 0-day threats, intrusions, malware infection, packet analysis', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Have a Masters, PhD, or equivalent experience in a quantitative field (Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, Statistics, Physics, or related field)', 'We’re', 'R&D: Lead and instrument work around developing AI prototypes and algorithms.', 'Together', 'Work Hours ', 'Chief data scientist: The candidate will be using their core competencies around AI and data science and help drive their teams build models that work at scale, harnessing Petabytes of data while applying it to products that need to respond with cyber analytics in milliseconds.', 'Experience working on Cybersecurity Insider Threat usecases and Investigations is a plus', 'Hiring and talent management', 'Additional Information', 'Core responsibility of team: This team is responsible for the design, implementation, and product engineering of Visa’s cyber security data analytics solutions. This team has products defending the perimeter using behavior biometrics and internally against Insider threat attacks. Using data science techniques, the team will build the tools and use cases to successfully help in the prevention of cyber attacks. ', 'Engineering muscle: The candidate should be an engineer at heart, possessing software engineering skills besides data science skills, allowing them to lead teams that build some of the most critical and marquee products in the entire company.', 'Qualifications', 'Have a Masters, PhD, or equivalent experience in a quantitative field (Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, Statistics, Physics, or related field)10+ years of experience in Machine Learning, Data Science, data engineering, or Software Engineering, with atleast 5+ of those years managing and leading Data Science or ML/software Engineering teams.Experience designing a data science roadmap and executing the vision behind it.Track record of delivering data-driven products and insights, and influencing product and engineering decisions.', 'Engineering muscle:', 'Track record of delivering data-driven products and insights, and influencing product and engineering decisions.', "Core responsibility: Provide leadership and direction in the innovation of bleeding-edge cybersecurity analytics based technologies with a focus on data science and applied artificial intelligence techniques. This will drive Visa's competitive advantage in payments by facilitating a best in class security infrastructure. You will be heavily engaged and will collaborate with two core teams. First - Visa's insider threat team and second - PD technology/IAM/fraud teams defending against authentication related threats. In addition, you will collaborate with colleagues in technology and product offices to establish effective, productive business relationships.Fiscal discipline: You will be leading multi-million dollar global projects, working with your team and PMO organization to develop timelines, constructing business case, cost estimates, ROI, and drive deliverables on time and budgetHiring and talent management: Build and manage a team of the very top talent with a track record of recruiting talent in cybersecurity analytics, data science, and software engineering.Presentation & communication skills: Be able to present results to a cross section of employees, including C-Level and other senior most leadership at Visa.Core responsibility of team: This team is responsible for the design, implementation, and product engineering of Visa’s cyber security data analytics solutions. This team has products defending the perimeter using behavior biometrics and internally against Insider threat attacks. Using data science techniques, the team will build the tools and use cases to successfully help in the prevention of cyber attacks. Engineering muscle: The candidate should be an engineer at heart, possessing software engineering skills besides data science skills, allowing them to lead teams that build some of the most critical and marquee products in the entire company.Chief data scientist: The candidate will be using their core competencies around AI and data science and help drive their teams build models that work at scale, harnessing Petabytes of data while applying it to products that need to respond with cyber analytics in milliseconds.R&D: Lead and instrument work around developing AI prototypes and algorithms.", 'Fiscal discipline', 'Travel Requirements ', 'EEO Statement ', 'Experience with Advanced Persistent Threat (APT) and criminal actors and advanced knowledge of associated Tactics, Techniques and Procedures (TTP) is a plus', 'Fiscal discipline: You will be leading multi-million dollar global projects, working with your team and PMO organization to develop timelines, constructing business case, cost estimates, ROI, and drive deliverables on time and budget', 'Company Description', 'Experience working on Cybersecurity Insider Threat usecases and Investigations is a plusExperience working on Behavior Biometrics and anomaly detection/fraud related usecases is a plusExperience with Advanced Persistent Threat (APT) and criminal actors and advanced knowledge of associated Tactics, Techniques and Procedures (TTP) is a plusDemonstrated expertise and experience with advanced and 0-day threats, intrusions, malware infection, packet analysisExperience working with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure) and infrastructure-as-code (e.g., Terraform)Experience working with Docker development and deployment workflows', 'Job Description', "Core responsibility: Provide leadership and direction in the innovation of bleeding-edge cybersecurity analytics based technologies with a focus on data science and applied artificial intelligence techniques. This will drive Visa's competitive advantage in payments by facilitating a best in class security infrastructure. You will be heavily engaged and will collaborate with two core teams. First - Visa's insider threat team and second - PD technology/IAM/fraud teams defending against authentication related threats. In addition, you will collaborate with colleagues in technology and product offices to establish effective, productive business relationships.", 'Hiring and talent management: Build and manage a team of the very top talent with a track record of recruiting talent in cybersecurity analytics, data science, and software engineering.', 'Experience working with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure) and infrastructure-as-code (e.g., Terraform)', 'Experience designing a data science roadmap and executing the vision behind it.', 'You’re', 'Core responsibility', 'Presentation & communication skills: Be able to present results to a cross section of employees, including C-Level and other senior most leadership at Visa.', 'Presentation & communication skills:', '10+ years of experience in Machine Learning, Data Science, data engineering, or Software Engineering, with atleast 5+ of those years managing and leading Data Science or ML/software Engineering teams.', 'Core responsibility of team']

['· Presentation and facilitation skills', 'The Lead Network Engineer’s role is to design and engineer the overall logical and technical architecture of Wiley’s office and WAN (Wide Area Networks) networks and related capabilities in line with the overall infrastructure roadmaps that are maintained by Enterprise Architecture. This role develops and owns the standards and maintains the high-level design plan for the overall logical and technical architecture components for this domain. This person will provide technical thought leadership and design specifications which can then be implemented in a sustainable and repeatable fashion to support business functional requirements across all Wiley Wide and Local Area Network technologies.', '· Experience with automation, AI and intent based networking a plus', '· Ability to work as an effective member of a global and multi-culturally diverse team', '· Ensure that all services are operating according to specifications, technical, functional and non-functional', 'At\u202fWiley, we welcome you\u202ffor who you are, the background you bring, and embrace people who get excited about learning whether online or by book. Learning\u202fis for everyone, and so is our workplace.\u202fBring your experiences, your perspectives, and your passion. It’s in our differences that we\u202fempower the way the world learns.\u202fWiley is a diverse, global\u202forganization\u202fand we are\u202fproud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer.\u202f', 'About the role', 'Wiley is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer.\xa0We evaluate qualified applicants and treat all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin,\xa0disability, protected veteran status, or based on any individual’s status in any group or class protected by applicable federal, state or local laws.\xa0', '· Develop, document, maintain, communicate, and enforce security infrastructure technology policy and standards', '· Strategic thinker. Ability to anticipate future needs and capabilities.', 'The Lead Network Engineer will gain organizational commitment for all high-level Network plans, whether wired or wireless, that enable connectivity within and across offices and data centres. They will initiate and participate in projects to evaluate technologies and methods for implementing these plans. The Lead Network Engineer will work closely with Enterprise Architecture to evaluate new technologies and assess the impacts of those on future roadmaps as well as migrations plans for technology refreshes and upgrades.', '\xa0', '· Positive, energetic, enthusiastic', '· Define the service catalogue requirements that are associated with the various domain capabilities', 'Job Summary', '· Continuously assess various emerging technologies to drive improvements in overall enterprise infrastructure performance, scalability and robustness', '· Ability to present ideas in user-friendly language', '· Enthusiastic to learn and keep abreast of the latest technologies, willing to adopt best practices', '· Work with EA to ensure that the WAN, LAN and Wireless services are clearly articulated for consumption by the solution architects, aligned with use cases, etc.', '· Technical knowledge across the various component layers of the network', '· Starter finisher. Good organization skills.', '· Drive reusable capabilities into the solution definitions and sunset legacy, end of life technologies', 'Hoboken, NJ', '· Expert level experience with an emphasis on Data Center/Cloud networking/security technologies, SD-WAN, Load Balancer and DNS design, implementation and support', '· Work closely with Enterprise Architecture and Corporate Services teams to design and engineer the infrastructure aspects of our internal/external network solutions', '· Document and maintain the current and future state technologies for WAN, LAN and Wireless capabilities.', 'We are in one of the most dynamic periods in our history as technology; globalism and economic diversity create far-reaching changes in the world. The demand for knowledge and learning has never been greater, and Wiley is at the forefront of meeting that need. As a learning business, we make meaningful contributions to research discovery and lifelong learning by helping organizations achieve their goals and people achieve success from education through their career. We may have been founded over two centuries ago, but our secret to success remains the same: change with the times and adapt to meet the ever-evolving needs of our customers.', 'About You', '· 10+ years of experience designing enterprise-wide WAN, LANs, VLANs, Wireless LANs, virtual networks, etc. or significant related experience', '· Develop and manage a domain roadmap and lifecycle plan in conjunction with Enterprise Architecture.', '· Conduct research on emerging technologies in support of network efforts and recommend technologies that will increase cost effectiveness and network infrastructure flexibility.', '· Ability to evaluate various technology capabilities and assess their applicability to Wiley’s needs, present and future', '· Design-thinking skills', '· Infrastructure Documentation', '· Operational requirements', '· Delivery of WAN and LAN capabilities', '· Exceptional analytical, conceptual, and problem-solving abilities', '· Creative, solution oriented', 'Lead Network Engineer', '· Review new and existing IT projects, systems designs, and procurement/outsourcing plans for compliance with domain policies and standards.', '· Degree in computer science, engineering or equivalent work experience.', '· Excellent verbal and written communications with ability to express / translate business needs into technology assisted solutions', '· Strong collaboration, consultation and influencing skills', '· Work through various service providers to deliver these capabilities and network infrastructure components according to specifications and in a timely and cost-effective manner']

job_text: ['', 'Experience with relational databases and SQL', 'Design software with network, system load over millions of records, responsiveness and error handling in mind.', 'Write robust, well tested, highly scalable, thread safe, well documented Java code.', 'Passion for software development and problem solving', 'Strong written and verbal communication', 'Deliver test plans, frameworks and strategies that test for the reality of load in our cloud.', 'Leverage your strong teamwork and collaboration skills and engage with other platform and applications teams to ensure all encryption tech meets the requirements of the consumers of our platform and works within the business automation structure of our cloud.', 'Experience designing and implementing highly interactive user interfaces for high volume web applications', 'Title: Senior Software Engineer in Platform Security', 'Use your excellent writing skills and forensic abilities to craft detailed Root Cause Analysis and mitigation plans for platform issues introduced by the security layer of the platform.', 'Cybersecurity is changing all the time. applications teams to ensure all encryption tech meets the requirements of the consumers of our platform and works within the business automation structure of our cloud.Build your experience in java debugging, heap and stack analysis, log analysis and basic cloud and network agility to quickly resolve customer issues on live instances.Use your excellent writing skills and forensic abilities to craft detailed Root Cause Analysis and mitigation plans for platform issues introduced by the security layer of the platform.Design software with network, system load over millions of records, ', 'What you’ll do on a typical day:\xa0\xa0 ', 'At a minimum, you’ll need:', 'Experience with AutoCAD, Microsoft Office, Mini Tab and Six Sigma analysis tools', 'Identify changes to existing functionality and test IT solutions and functionality; partner with IT team to identify and document new functionality not currently available ', 'Software and controls engineering experience ', 'It’d be great if you also have:', 'What you need to succeed at XPO:', 'Ability to handle multiple projects and time demands with a high level of urgency, personal integrity, energy and stamina ', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent related work or military experience 2 years of experience in high-volume operations and distribution-related work Experience implementing all types of sorters and goods-to-person systems, including high-density automated storage and retrieval systems (ASRS), carousels and robotic systems\xa0 Experience with simulation software, 3D modeling/drawing and designing components and system parts Experience with AutoCAD, Microsoft Office, Mini Tab and Six Sigma analysis tools", 'Specify packing methods to be used based on mode/method of transportation and product profile; specify containers/cartons and packing (void fill) medium requirements ', 'Conduct root cause analyses of labor and/or process inefficiencies through operational data analysis, Pareto charts, process reviews, time studies, statistical reviews, simulation and discussions with operational leadership ', 'Demonstrated ability as a collaborative, innovative and strategic thinker who is decisive and results-oriented ', 'We are eager to attract the best, so we offer competitive compensation and a generous benefits package, including full health insurance (medical, dental and vision), 401(k), life insurance, disability and more.', 'Identify outbound labeling/documentation requirements; provide annual cost estimates for packing materials and create cartonization tables\xa0 ', 'Experience with simulation software, 3D modeling/drawing and designing components and system parts ', 'At XPO Logistics, we’re transforming transportation and logistics through technology by investing hundreds of millions of dollars in IT every year. As the Senior Automation Software Engineer, you will have a meaningful role in our future success by analyzing high labor content activities across the company and designing automation to improve operational efficiency and deliver positive Return on Investment (ROI) and Return on Invested Capital (ROIC). This is an exciting opportunity to improve productivity by developing strategies to help people work smarter, ensuring that we stay ahead of our competitors while delighting our customers. We will equip you with the best tools in the industry to grow and develop to a level that will exceed your expectations and help you reach your career goals.', 'Experience with Programmable Logic Controllers (PLC) and electrical controls of motors, Variable Frequency Drives (VFDs), switches, diverters, spirals and various conveyor components and types ', '1st Shift, Monday – Friday, 8:00am – 5:00pm', 'Experience implementing all types of sorters and goods-to-person systems, including high-density automated storage and retrieval systems (ASRS), carousels and robotic systems\xa0 ', 'Develop design and equipment specifications for the implementation of automation solutions, including identifying facility design requirements based on activity levels, product envelope, product flow and transportation methods ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical, Electrical or Industrial Engineering with a focus in Robotics/Automation Engineering\xa0 ', 'Solid knowledge of project management principles with the ability to use discernment within defined practices and procedures\xa0 ', 'Design startup and ongoing personnel requirements for automation solutions based on product profile and activity levels; identify management and supervisory requirements for operations personnel', 'Logistics done differently. ', '2 years of experience in high-volume operations and distribution-related work ', 'Design, plan, source and implement automation solutions, including robotics, conveyors, sorters, scanners, vision systems and PLCsConduct root cause analyses of labor and/or process inefficiencies through operational data analysis, Pareto charts, process reviews, time studies, statistical reviews, simulation and discussions with operational leadership Develop design and equipment specifications for the implementation of automation solutions, including identifying facility design requirements based on activity levels, product envelope, product flow and transportation methods Build layouts and power requirements to accept automation designs; specify material handling and storage equipment solutions\xa0 Design startup and ongoing personnel requirements for automation solutions based on product profile and activity levels; identify management and supervisory requirements for operations personnelDetermine required maintenance support positions for each site depending on equipment functionality and service level requirements for on-site operations; develop preventive maintenance tasks and schedules to mitigate less than 100% uptime operations\xa0 Identify changes to existing functionality and test IT solutions and functionality; partner with IT team to identify and document new functionality not currently available Specify packing methods to be used based on mode/method of transportation and product profile; specify containers/cartons and packing (void fill) medium requirements Identify outbound labeling/documentation requirements; provide annual cost estimates for packing materials and create cartonization tables\xa0 Develop processes and procedures for human interface functionality with automation equipment, along with supporting validation techniques and metrics to ensure successful project completion ', 'Determine required maintenance support positions for each site depending on equipment functionality and service level requirements for on-site operations; develop preventive maintenance tasks and schedules to mitigate less than 100% uptime operations\xa0 ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical, Electrical or Industrial Engineering with a focus in Robotics/Automation Engineering\xa0 Availability to travel up to 30% of the time Experience with Programmable Logic Controllers (PLC) and electrical controls of motors, Variable Frequency Drives (VFDs), switches, diverters, spirals and various conveyor components and types Solid knowledge of project management principles with the ability to use discernment within defined practices and procedures\xa0 Demonstrated ability as a collaborative, innovative and strategic thinker who is decisive and results-oriented Ability to handle multiple projects and time demands with a high level of urgency, personal integrity, energy and stamina ', 'Be part of something big.', 'Design, plan, source and implement automation solutions, including robotics, conveyors, sorters, scanners, vision systems and PLCs', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent related work or military experience "]

['', 'Location: Baltimore, MD/ Dulles, VA/ Plano, TX', ' At least 4 years of experience managing one or more of the following data warehouse platforms (Vertica, Google Big Query, Redshift, Snowflake, Druid) and OLTP (Oracle, MySQL, MongoDB). Solid working knowledge of database architecture (column orientation, compression, projections, segmentations, partitions, high availability and recovery, security). Prior experience demonstrated thorough knowledge and progressively responsible experience in the implementation and maintenance of large-scale OLTP, OLAP, and data warehouse systems. Experience with AWS technical essentials such as RDS, EC2, S3, security, and networking. Proficient with shell scripting and/or a programming language such as Ruby or Python in order to automate cloud infrastructure tasks. Experience with DevOps Orchestration/Configuration Management technologies such as Chef, Puppet, Docker, Jenkins, Ansible, JIRA, Github. Strong working knowledge of basic system administration on Linux. Experience with Performance Tuning and Optimization (PTO), using native monitoring and troubleshooting tools. Experience with backups, restores, and recovery models. Excellent interpersonal communication and teamwork skills. Knowledge of formal information security standards and best practices, including database system hardening, identity management, and database access controls. Demonstrated project management skills and the ability to track and report progress against established milestones, metrics, and deliverables. Demonstrated verbal and written communication skills with strong customer service orientation. Positive attitude, ability to work in a team and ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment with minimal supervision. Ability to work in a rapidly changing environment and willing to learn other database technologies. AWS and/or Vertica certification is a plus. ', 'Must Have', 'Perform database design, run database benchmarks, and conduct proof of concept exercises.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Analyze, solve, and correct issues in real-time, providing end-to-end problem resolution.', 'Work with end-users for special requests and new setups.', 'Participates in the setting of objectives, strategies, plans, programs, performance standards/measures and procedures, as a member of the IT leadership team.', 'Refine and automate regular processes, track issues, and document changes.', 'Prior experience demonstrated thorough knowledge and progressively responsible experience in the implementation and maintenance of large-scale OLTP, OLAP, and data warehouse systems.', 'Must have 2-3+ years of experience in MYSQL.', 'Manage databases through multiple product lifecycle environments, from development to production systems in both on-prem (OpenStack, bare metal) and AWS environments.', 'At least 4 years of experience managing one or more of the following data warehouse platforms (Vertica, Google Big Query, Redshift, Snowflake, Druid) and OLTP (Oracle, MySQL, MongoDB).', 'Must have strong experience with AWS including essential AWS technologies like RDS, EC2, S3, security, and networking.', 'Strong working knowledge of basic system administration on Linux.', ' Manage databases through multiple product lifecycle environments, from development to production systems in both on-prem (OpenStack, bare metal) and AWS environments. Refine and automate regular processes, track issues, and document changes. Perform scheduled maintenance and support release deployment activities after hours. Plan, build, deploy, and maintain enterprise OLTP and OLAP based EDW platforms and services. This includes proactive monitoring and tracking, and relevant data analysis and reporting. Proactive and reactive performance analysis, monitoring, troubleshooting, and root-cause analysis of database related issues in support of critical day-to-day business operations. Responsible for establishing and enforcing consistent database standards, access protocols, profiling and benchmarking, and development, execution, and measurement of effective service level agreements. Responsible for database capacity planning and efficient utilization of database resources based on performance, growth, and utilization trends. Responsible for ensuring high-availability (>99.0%) of critical database systems and services and development, implementation, and testing of failover and recovery plans for all critical database systems. Participates in the setting of objectives, strategies, plans, programs, performance standards/measures and procedures, as a member of the IT leadership team. Develop and implement plans for database consolidation where needed. Work with end-users for special requests and new setups. ['Title: Cloud Data EngineerLocation: Austin, TX (Remote until COVID restrictions are lifted)Duration: Until 8/31/2021Job Type: ContractJob Description:', 'Minimum Requirements:', 'As the State of Texas rushes to address the many impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, it has become critical to rely on the Department of State Health Services (DSHS) to provide reliable, up to the minute data regarding the current state of infection in the state.  As DSHS works to provide this critical data to inform decision makers, health care administrators and citizens, the agency is experiencing serious limitations in the ability to efficiently and reliably provide the data due to a legacy of disparate systems and data that currently resides in numerous locations and databases across the agency. Sharing this vital data across all of these systems is inherently difficult, time-consuming, and requires resource intensive manual and inefficient processes. These cumbersome manual processes have a severe impact on Texas\' ability to respond effectively to the COVID-19 pandemic and prevent the loss of life.The Infectious Disease Data Integration (IDDI) project is intended to improve the efficiency of current processes. An integrated approach to data services will aid in providing the most current data to inform decision makers about the health and readiness statuses of jurisdictions across the state.The Infectious Disease Data Integration project aims to create a data analytics platform plus data governance with Informatica Axon. The IDDI platform will facilitate the sharing, reporting, and analytics of the data collected from the COVID-19 contact tracing in the Texas Health Trace (THT) system, the COVID-19 case management data contained in the National Electronic Disease Surveillance System (NEDSS), and COVID-19 immunization tracking in the ImmTrac system.All work products resulting from the project shall be considered  "works made for hire” and are the property of the HHSC. HHSC may include pre-selection requirements that potential Vendors (and their Workers) submit to and satisfy criminal background checks as authorized by the Texas law. HHSC will pay no fees for interviews or discussions, which occur during the process of selecting a Worker(s).HHSC IT is currently implementing a Analytics Platform with Informatica PowerCenter, Snowflake and AWS technologies as well as Informatica Axon Data Governance with a goal to accomplish improved COVID-19 reporting.·  Assist DSHS program area use of the IDDI Platform to its fullest potential·  Assist with analytics use with off the shelf reporting tools like SAS, SPSS, Tableau, ARCgis·  Assist with publishing as needed to Tableau and/or ARCgis servers or other web platforms·  Data modeling, data profiling, data quality, data validation, data curation and data transformation·  Resolve any data source ingestion issues·  Operationalize ingestion of new data sources as needed·  Other work includes, but is not limited to:·  Validation of performance metric requirements·  Creation of EPICS/User Stories·  Creation and validation of dashboard and report mock-ups·  Automation of data acquisition from a variety of data sources·  Dashboard and report development·  Testing – integration, load and stress, and user·  Deployment / publication internally and externally·  Operations support and enhancement of the IDDI platform·  All other duties as assignedMinimum Requirements:Candidates that do not meet or exceed the minimum stated requirements (skills/experience) will be displayed to customers but may not be chosen for this opportunity.Years    Required/Preferred    Experience8    Required    Experience as a data engineer implementing data pipelines for a data mart or a data warehouse.6    Required    Excellent oral and written communication skills.6    Required    Effectively manage multiple responsibilities, prioritize conflicting assignments, and switch quickly between assignments, as required.4    Required    Experience in interfacing with tools such as Informatica PowerCenter and Informatica Data Quality jobs.4    Required    Design highly scalable ETL processes with complex data transformations, data formats including error handling and monitoring.3    Required    Experience in implementing data pipelines using cloud native services on any one of the major cloud platforms.2    Required    Hands-on experience implementing solutions using Snowflake utilities, SnowSQL, and SnowPipe.3    Preferred    Prior experience in the Healthcare Industry2    Preferred    Experience working in an agile sprint team.2    Preferred    Prior experience with an HHS agency']

contribute to a team culture of qualityYou're passionate about our mission to eliminate food waste and create a better food system for all", 'Imperfect Foods was founded in 2015 with a mission to reduce food waste and build a better food system for everyone. We offer imperfect (yet delicious) produce, affordable pantry items, and quality meat and dairy. We deliver them conveniently to our customers’ doorsteps and pride ourselves on offering up to a 30% discount compared to grocery store prices. Our customers can get the healthy, seasonal produce they want alongside the grocery staples they rely on, without having to compromise their budget or values. We’re proving that doing the right thing for the planet doesn’t have to cost more, and that shopping for quality ingredients can support the people and resources that it takes to grow our favorite foods.', "We're headquartered in San Francisco with operations all over the country. Check\xa0our website\xa0to see if there is an Imperfect near you!", 'Actively contribute to team and company standards', 'Skills and Qualifications:', 'Keep up-to-date with the latest technology developments related to your domain', 'At Imperfect, our software engineering team builds the e-commerce platform and internal tooling that drives our mission. The team partners closely with product management and UX designers to develop features, solutions, and systems that enhance and transform user experience. Imperfect Engineers don’t just build widgets -- we participate in the full life-cycle of a feature, from conception to release. We’re a remote first team with members throughout the US. This role will report to the Engineering Manager for mobile development.']

job_title: IT Senior System Engineer – Team Lead
job_text: ['', '$90,000 – $125,000 (commensurate with experience)', ' Lead all cloud infrastructure evaluation, design, architecture and implementation projects and tasks both internally and for clients. Act as the last escalation point for the Engineering team for all technical issues. Participate in pre-sales technical meetings to vet potential clients and participate in client discovery meetings. Design, develop, and/or integrate proven solutions to complex application problems for vast portfolio of commercial customers. Troubleshoot system administration issues or network concerns. ', 'Certification Reimbursement (job related)', ' Proposed Salary ', 'Generous PTO', 'IT Senior System Engineer – Team Lead ', ' Opportunity Location ', 'Health, Vision, & Dental Insurance', '401(k) with company match', 'Design, develop, and/or integrate proven solutions to complex application problems for vast portfolio of commercial customers.', 'IT Senior System Engineer – Team Lead Description', ' Apply For This Opening ', 'IT Senior System Engineer – Team Lead Responsibilities', 'Troubleshoot system administration issues or network concerns.', 'Act as the last escalation point for the Engineering team for all technical issues.', 'Participate in pre-sales technical meetings to vet potential clients and participate in client discovery meetings.', 'IT Senior System Engineer – Team Lead Salary + Benefits:', 'Lead all cloud infrastructure evaluation, design, architecture and implementation projects and tasks both internally and for clients.', ' $90,000 – $125,000 (commensurate with experience) Health, Vision, & Dental Insurance Generous PTO 401(k) with company match Certification Reimbursement (job related) ']

['', 'Help others leverage your expertise, by coaching and mentoring in your organisation by contributing to the professional development of colleagues, improving their technical knowledge and the engineering practices.', 'Demonstrated experience in shipping high quality products and services.', 'An exciting and fun environment committed to driving real growth', "Sharesave scheme and Value Creation Plan – be part of the group's success", 'THE SCOPE', 'Write simple, exemplary code that motivates the team to write quality code & follow the highest standards.', 'Learn alone and with your team: through self-development, 10% time, and hackathons. You keep up to date with new technologies and the best ways to solve problems.', ' Solid experience building and designing Highly scalable, Fault tolerant and always available systems. Good grasp of a broad range of data structures and algorithms. Solid understanding of design patterns and architectural principles. Expert in at least one modern programming language e.g. Java or Python or any Functional/OO programming language. Demonstrated abilities driving operational excellence and best practices. Demonstrated experience in shipping high quality products and services. ', 'What You Bring To The Team', " An exciting and fun environment committed to driving real growth Sharesave scheme and Value Creation Plan – be part of the group's success Conference tickets and online training resources to help you keep learning We buy you the software you prefer to work with, and high end hardware to run it on Flexible vacation allowance to let you refuel Excellent benefit programs and platforms Opportunities to build really cool products that fans love ", 'Demonstrated abilities driving operational excellence and best practices.', 'What You Will Do', 'Take ownership of team architecture, providing a system wide view and design guidance.', 'Support our software in the on-call rotation where required.', 'Solid understanding of design patterns and architectural principles.', 'Expert in at least one modern programming language e.g. Java or Python or any Functional/OO programming language.', 'We buy you the software you prefer to work with, and high end hardware to run it on', 'Flexible vacation allowance to let you refuel', 'Excellent benefit programs and platforms', 'What You Will Get', 'Good grasp of a broad range of data structures and algorithms.', 'Lead Software Engineer - Account and Wallet', 'THE POSITION', 'Opportunities to build really cool products that fans love', 'Drive engineering engagement best practices (e.g., Operational Excellence, Security, Quality, etc.) and set standards.', 'Be a key influencer in team strategy, show good judgement when making technical trade-offs between your team’s short-term business or operational needs and long-term technology needs.', 'Solid experience building and designing Highly scalable, Fault tolerant and always available systems.', 'Conference tickets and online training resources to help you keep learning', ' Take ownership of team architecture, providing a system wide view and design guidance. Write simple, exemplary code that motivates the team to write quality code & follow the highest standards. Be a key influencer in team strategy, show good judgement when making technical trade-offs between your team’s short-term business or operational needs and long-term technology needs. Drive engineering engagement best practices (e.g., Operational Excellence, Security, Quality, etc.) and set standards. Help others leverage your expertise, by coaching and mentoring in your organisation by contributing to the professional development of colleagues, improving their technical knowledge and the engineering practices. Support our software in the on-call rotation where required. Learn alone and with your team: through self-development, 10% time, and hackathons. You keep up to date with new technologies and the best ways to solve problems. ']

We have an immediate need for an experienced Cleared Senior Systems Engineer/ISSO.  The candidate will be expected to solve varied technical problems; and generate and review designs for technical accuracy, completeness and appropriateness in light of objectives, budget, and schedule, as requested by the customer. The candidate will develop solutions integrating and extending FOSS, COTS and GOTS products from multiple vendors for cross domain solutions, cognitive bias, socio-metric software studies of interaction and map visualizations. The candidate will also develop services that ingest, harvest, distribute, store and display data for analysis objectives.', 'Security Clearance Requirements:', "A Bachelor's degree in a technical discipline from an accredited\xa0college or university.\xa0", 'U.S. Citizens\xa0', 'This position requires all candidates to be\xa0U.S. Citizens\xa0and possess\xa0an active TS/SCI Security Clearance with a Polygraph.']

job_text: ['', 'Merchandise discount for our brands: 50% off regular-priced merchandise at Gap, Banana Republic and Old Navy, 30% off at Outlet and 25% off at Athleta for all employees.', 'Employee stock purchase plan.*', ' Merchandise discount for our brands: 50% off regular-priced merchandise at Gap, Banana Republic and Old Navy, 30% off at Outlet and 25% off at Athleta for all employees. One of the most competitive Paid Time Off plans in the industry.* Employees can take up to five “on the clock” hours each month to volunteer at a charity of their choice.* Extensive 401(k) plan with company matching for contributions up to four percent of an employee’s base pay.* Employee stock purchase plan.* Medical, dental, vision and life insurance.* See more of the benefits we offer. ', 'Extensive 401(k) plan with company matching for contributions up to four percent of an employee’s base pay.*', 'Solid experience in query tuning, performance optimization and database “build and run” with a DevOps mindset', 'Employees can take up to five “on the clock” hours each month to volunteer at a charity of their choice.*', 'Medical, dental, vision and life insurance.*', 'About Gap Inc.', 'One of the most competitive Paid Time Off plans in the industry.*', 'Engage actively with team members to continuously improve engineering design, practices and methodology', 'For eligible employees', ' 7-10 years of database engineering experience with a primary focus on multi-node database systems, backing extremely high-volume Java-based services In-depth knowledge and technical expertise with both SQL and NoSQL based database and data cache systems including Oracle RDBMS / RAC, MySQL, Postgres, MariaDB, Redis, HBase Experience running workloads on Public Clouds such as AWS, Azure or GCP, leveraging Cloud-native PaaS databases such as Cosmos, Azure SQL, RDS is a major plus. Solid experience in query tuning, performance optimization and database “build and run” with a DevOps mindset Expertise in designing and integrating with service-oriented architectures, keeping performance and security in mind. Experience with modern DevOps development tools including Git, Jenkins, JIRA, PagerDuty and logging/monitoring tools such as New Relic and Splunk ', 'Engage in best-in-class DevOps practices with end-to-end “design, build and run” responsibilities', 'Experience with modern DevOps development tools including Git, Jenkins, JIRA, PagerDuty and logging/monitoring tools such as New Relic and Splunk NoSQL based database and data cache systems including Oracle RDBMS / RAC, MySQL, Postgres, MariaDB, Redis, HBase', 'Work collaboratively with engineering and technical operations team members to build architectures, keeping performance and security in mind.']
