['', 'Knowledge of one or more distributed messaging systems (Kafka preferred)Knowledge of big data and/or stream processing technologies (Spark, Hadoop, Kafka Streams, Flink, etc…)', 'www.ware2go.co', 'To ALL recruitment agencies: Ware2Go only accepts resumes from agencies on the Ware2Go or UPS preferred supplier list.\xa0Please do not forward resumes to our applicant tracking system, Ware2Go employees, or any UPS facility.\xa0\xa0Ware2Go is not responsible for any\xa0fees or charges associated\xa0with unsolicited resumes.', 'with', 'Deep understanding of REST based web services', '7+ years of relevant engineering experienceProven experience with Java 8 or higher (Kotlin preferred)Experience developing Microservices, DevOps, Test Automation and CI/CDExperience with Elasticsearch and PostgreSQLExperience designing and building highly scalable, distributed systemsExtensive experience with JVM based applications (including concurrency and multi-threading) and/or Node.js based applicationsDeep understanding of REST based web servicesExperience working in cloud environments (GCP or AWS), preferably with “cloud-native” architecturesA willingness and ability to help mentor junior and mid-level team membersA passion for clean, high-quality codeAn interest in continuous learning, expanding technical knowledge, and the good judgment to know when and when not to introduce new technologies', 'To ALL recruitment agencies: ', 'Required Skills:', 'About Ware2Go', 'As a Sr. Software Engineer you will drive projects end-to-end, collaborate on product requirements with Product Managers, architect and implement technical solutions, and ensure continued success after deployment. You will lead and participate in design reviews and architecture discussions.', 'You write pragmatic code and strive for simplicity, while bringing technical insights into how to refine and improve the system, ultimately ensuring performance, stability, and an exceptional end user experience.', 'Knowledge of big data and/or stream processing technologies (Spark, Hadoop, Kafka Streams, Flink, etc…)', 'A passion for clean, high-quality code', 'An interest in continuous learning, expanding technical knowledge, and the good judgment to know when and when not to introduce new technologies', 'The Role', 'Experience with Elasticsearch and PostgreSQL', 'Seek excellence in everything they do', '7+ years of relevant engineering experience', 'Experience working in cloud environments (GCP or AWS), preferably with “cloud-native” architectures', 'Thrive in a fast-paced, high energy workplace', "Seek excellence in everything they doThrive in a fast-paced, high energy workplaceValue efficiency and respect other people's timeAre team players and have a strong work ethicon't forget to have fun and be positive", 'Are team players and have a strong work ethic', 'Nice to Have:', 'Integrated into our shared values is Ware2Go’s commitment to diversity. Ware2Go is committed to being a globally inclusive company where all people are treated fairly, recognized for their individuality, promoted based on performance and encouraged to strive to reach their full potential. We believe in understanding and respecting differences among all people. This concept encompasses but is not limited to human differences with regard to race, ethnicity, religion, gender, culture and physical ability. Every individual at Ware2Go has an ongoing responsibility to respect and support a globally diverse environment.', "on't forget to have fun and be positive", 'We build our culture around people that:', "Value efficiency and respect other people's time", 'Proven experience with Java 8 or higher (Kotlin preferred)', 'Experience designing and building highly scalable, distributed systems', 'Ware2Go is looking for a Sr. Software Engineer to join our Product Development Team.\xa0', 'Extensive experience with JVM based applications (including concurrency and multi-threading) and/or Node.js based applications', 'A willingness and ability to help mentor junior and mid-level team members', 'EEO Statement', 'Experience developing Microservices, DevOps, Test Automation and CI/CD', 'Knowledge of one or more distributed messaging systems (Kafka preferred)', 'Ware2Go is a technology platform backed by UPS that connects merchants seeking warehousing and fulfillment with 3PLs and warehouse operators whose capabilities match their needs. For merchants, we enable easy access to a turnkey nationwide fulfillment network of independent warehouses via a single portal that embeds inventory and order management. For 3PLs, we enable one-stop demand acquisition and no- integration customer onboarding via an intuitive, end-to-end, cloud-based warehouse management system. Standardized and simplified terms, operating procedures, and pricing replace long negotiations, complex set up processes, and lengthy contract commitments, enabling both merchants and 3PLs to quickly set up and flexibly scale on the platform. We help merchants deliver goods to their customers faster and help 3PLs grow their customer base and monetize excess capacity.', 'fees or']

This team delivers analytic products to our customers via online channels and smart connected devices. We work together with Bosch Research and Development centers globally to use the latest technologies to create powerful and compelling experiences that will change the way that our users experience Bosch products.", 'Developing next generation data driven models and algorithm for intelligent transportation use-cases', 'PhD in Data Mining, Traffic OptimizationProficient in C++ or JavaFamiliar with agile development processesStatistical background in Big Data analysis', 'PhD in Data Mining, Traffic Optimization', '5+ years of Python experience', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Optimizing algorithm to real-world scenarios', 'Basic Qualifications:', '3+ years of work experience with Machine Learning techniques (e.g. Deep Learning, SVM, clustering, prediction, time serial analysis) solving new and challenging problems in a product development environment', 'Help us to develop our next generation algorithms for e.g. behavioral classification, forecasting and prediction, fusion of multiple data sources, or in general improving our current algorithm by more sophisticated data driving models. Specifically, our lab\xa0works in the fast-paced field of the Internet of Things and Services (IoTS) – an exciting combination of business, technology, software, design, and user experience that is driven by the rapid development of connectivity, mobile computing, social computing, and Big Data analytics. job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Operational Data and Events (ODE)
job_text: ['', 'Ensure development practices follow industry and enterprise Delta IT standards ', 'Participate in the design, development and maintenance of the ERMS applicationCollaborate with portfolio architects, IT partners across the organization as well as the business analysts to analyze requirements and produce quality software Design and execute application and system test cases Work on performance optimization and problem resolution Ensure development practices follow industry and enterprise Delta IT standards Conduct code reviews and provide feedback Communicate status on project tasks and issues to manager on a regular basis both verbally and in writing ', 'Detail-oriented and able to handle multiple concurrent tasks', 'Work on performance optimization and problem resolution ', 'Ability to define, capture and report on metrics to present management a clear picture of the overall health of production and lower level environments ', 'A minimum of 10 years’ experience and knowledge in application design and development using multiple tools/technologies', 'Communicate status on project tasks and issues to manager on a regular basis both verbally and in writing ', 'Strong technical, analytical and problem solving skills ', 'A successful software developer in ERMS will have extensive experience and knowledge in building long-running, distributed, fault-tolerant backend systems in multiple languages including C++ and Java. Candidates should have extensive experience and knowledge of C++, Java, Windows, Linux, spring Batch/BootXML, XSD, XSLT, and SQL. Proficiencies should also include experience with Oracle and DB2 databases, FTP/SFTP.', 'Embraces diverse people, thinking and styles', 'Additional skills/experiences desired include working within multiple cloud environments, migrating existing applications to the cloud, CI/CD, Microservices, RESTful API’s, Kafka, 12 Factor, OpenShift.', 'Design and execute application and system test cases ', 'Collaborate with portfolio architects, IT partners across the organization as well as the business analysts to analyze requirements and produce quality software ', 'A successful software developer in ERMS will have extensive experience and knowledge in building long-running, distributed, fault-tolerant backend systems in multiple languages including C++ and Java. Candidates should have extensive experience and knowledge of C++, Java, Windows, Linux, spring Batch/BootXML, XSD, XSLT, and SQL. Proficiencies should also include experience with Oracle and DB2 databases, FTP/SFTP.Additional skills/experiences desired include working within multiple cloud environments, migrating existing applications to the cloud, CI/CD, Microservices, RESTful API’s, Kafka, 12 Factor, OpenShift.', "Embraces diverse people, thinking and stylesConsistently makes safety and security, of self and others, the priorityBachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent experience A minimum of 10 years’ experience and knowledge in application design and development using multiple tools/technologiesStrong technical, analytical and problem solving skills Ability to define, capture and report on metrics to present management a clear picture of the overall health of production and lower level environments Advanced knowledge of software development lifecycle Detail-oriented and able to handle multiple concurrent tasks", "Consistently makes safety and security, of self and others, the priorityBachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent experience ", 'Advanced knowledge of software development lifecycle ', 'Participate in the design, development and maintenance of the ERMS application', 'Conduct code reviews and provide feedback ']

['', " Responsible for identifying, defining and documenting appropriate security controls for the bank's cloud applications.", ' Well versed in working with NIST security framework and Cybersecurity Assessment Tool (CAT) from FFIEC', ' Provide assistance to the Network Security team in the engineering of cloud security controls.', 'Responsibilities', ' Must be well versed in Windows environments, Active Directory, VPN systems, encryption schemas and algorithms, various authorization and authentication mechanisms/software, network monitoring and sniffing, TCP/IP networks and vulnerability and threat management tools (including network based scanners).', 'Description', ' Responsible for engineering cloud security solutions to include Security Incident and Event Monitoring (SIEM) system, vulnerability scanning, web application testing, network monitoring, and Database Activity Monitoring.', ' Expert communicator.', ' BS in Computer Science or equivalent. Well versed in working with NIST security framework and Cybersecurity Assessment Tool (CAT) from FFIEC Understanding of controls (e.g. access control, auditing, authentication, encryption, integrity, physical security, and application security). Technical cloud and security certifications highly desirable (e.g. CCSP, CCA, CCP, AWS, Azure, CCSK, CISA, CISSP, GCIH) Expert communicator. Must be well versed in Windows environments, Active Directory, VPN systems, encryption schemas and algorithms, various authorization and authentication mechanisms/software, network monitoring and sniffing, TCP/IP networks and vulnerability and threat management tools (including network based scanners). Beneficial if experienced in Database Activity Monitoring Systems (DAM), and Web Application Firewalls (WAF).', ' Project Consulting: Provide security consulting services, as needed, to various projects. Provide input and guidance to the Information Security Architect in the design of security solutions.', ' Must be able to review and analyze data reports and manuals; must be computer proficient. Must be able to communicate effectively via telephone and in person.', 'Qualifications', "What You'll Do As a Cloud Security Engineer", " Responsible for identifying, defining and documenting appropriate security controls for the bank's cloud applications. Responsible for engineering cloud security solutions to include Security Incident and Event Monitoring (SIEM) system, vulnerability scanning, web application testing, network monitoring, and Database Activity Monitoring. Responsible for identifying, defining, documenting, prioritizing and building security control use cases across the cloud landscape. Responsible for ensuring policies, standards and other supporting documentation such as CAT controls appropriately reflect the bank's cloud applications. Responsible for disseminating and reporting data to other teams as appropriate Project Consulting: Provide security consulting services, as needed, to various projects. Provide input and guidance to the Information Security Architect in the design of security solutions. Provide assistance to the Network Security team in the engineering of cloud security controls.", " Responsible for ensuring policies, standards and other supporting documentation such as CAT controls appropriately reflect the bank's cloud applications.", ' BS in Computer Science or equivalent.', ' Responsible for identifying, defining, documenting, prioritizing and building security control use cases across the cloud landscape.', ' Must be able to communicate effectively via telephone and in person.', 'Job Demands', ' Technical cloud and security certifications highly desirable (e.g. CCSP, CCA, CCP, AWS, Azure, CCSK, CISA, CISSP, GCIH)', ' Beneficial if experienced in Database Activity Monitoring Systems (DAM), and Web Application Firewalls (WAF).', ' Must be able to review and analyze data reports and manuals; must be computer proficient.', ' Understanding of controls (e.g. access control, auditing, authentication, encryption, integrity, physical security, and application security).', ' Responsible for disseminating and reporting data to other teams as appropriate']

', ' Trimble is looking to hire a senior embedded perception software engineer for vehicle automation, autonomy and machine coordination. Trimble has long been a leader in precision self-steering semi-autonomous vehicle systems and is continuing to lead in developing innovative and intelligent vehicle automation solutions. This role will be critical to developing market-leading products and solutions; working closely with systems engineers, UI, software and firmware engineers, hardware engineers, test engineers, and product marketing. ', ' Generate three-dimensional maps ', ' Ability to travel up to 10% ', ' Trimble is transforming the way the world works by delivering products and services that connect the physical and digital worlds. From purpose built products to enterprise lifecycle solutions, Trimble software, hardware and services are transforming a broad range of industries such as agriculture, construction, geospatial and transportation and logistics. ', 'Trimble', ' Understanding of GNSS and inertial sensor technology ', 'The Role', ' Trimble’s Autonomous Solutions Division is a leader in autonomous technologies for the agricultural and construction industries that help customers operate more efficiently, save on input costs, and increase yield and precision. ['', 'Bachelor’s degree in Industrial Automation, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent.', "ProSoft Technology employees are afforded an exciting and challenging work environment that is casual, supportive and team-oriented. We promote a workplace culture that encourages leadership, teamwork, innovation and creativity to attract and retain the most talented and motivated people.\xa0Our philosophy has always been to do everything we can to fulfill the needs of our customers.\xa0Prospective employees would show an interest in that type of culture and be ready to work hard and play hard. Our culture allows someone to bring in their own knowledge and ideas, and really feel like they've made an impact to the organization.", 'Experience optimizing process control maintenance.', 'Planning and executing the validation of communication products and associated configuration software under developmentDesigning formal test procedures and test plans from internal product design documentation as well as from external certification requirementsAssisting in the investigation of functional and performance failures that are discovered during hardware, software, and integration testingTransitioning products from design to certification, as well as from design through production; converting data collected during testing into consumable status and formal reports', 'Responsibilities for our Test Engineer will include:', 'Experience with process control equipment facilities.', '2+ years of experience troubleshooting problems with PLC or HMI applications (Rockwell, ABB, Schneider Electrics products experience preferred).', '\xa0', 'Experience modifying automation applications, such as when operational changes are performed on a production line.', '2+ years of experience with all aspects of factory automation, process control, infrastructure and applications.', 'Planning and executing the validation of communication products and associated configuration software under development', 'Our Test Engineer will work with the test engineering and development team to help produce high quality ProSoft products. This person needs to be a detail-oriented, technically skilled person, and enjoy working in a team environment with automation equipment and industrial network protocols.', 'ProSoft is just one of the many brands that make up Belden’s impressive portfolio. Belden is a multi-billion dollar global organization of 10,000 talented people that supports the mission-critical network infrastructure and audio visual broadcast needs of many of the world’s best-known brands, placing us at the heart of the global transformation to a truly connected world. We are seeking driven, results-oriented team members to help us continue to grow and succeed.', 'RSLogix experience required.', 'Required Skills and Experience for our Test Engineer:', 'ProSoft Technology provides solutions to help our customers increase production, reduce downtime, and lower operating and maintenance costs worldwide. Our solutions focus on Connectivity, Optimization, Modernization, and Migration challenges, and are at the center of the Industrial Internet of Things. We supply industrial communication solutions that enable dissimilar automation control equipment to share information and transfer critical control data through wired and wireless connectivity.\xa0', 'Designing formal test procedures and test plans from internal product design documentation as well as from external certification requirements', 'PROSOFT (A BELDEN COMPANY) IS NOW HIRING A TEST ENGINEER FOR OUR BAKERSFIELD, CA LOCATION.', 'These statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work involved for this job. It is not an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties and skills required of this job.', 'Assisting in the investigation of functional and performance failures that are discovered during hardware, software, and integration testing', 'This company is an equal opportunity employer and makes employment decisions without regard to race, gender, disability, or protected veteran status.\xa0', 'Experience with ensuring reliability of electrical and process control hardware and software operation.', "Our Test Engineer will be responsible for creating test plans for new products and product upgrade testing. They will test the module's application firmware operation and features, the hardware interfaces, and configuration software. They need to be comfortable doing wireframe analysis, doing Wireshark captures and analyzing the output. They will read industrial protocol standards and test the product to the standards and the expected product feature set. They will need to duplicate customer issues and help solve them.", 'Transitioning products from design to certification, as well as from design through production; converting data collected during testing into consumable status and formal reports']

We empower team members to do their best while holding them to a higher standard of growth, accomplishment, and results. We are looking for someone to bring industry standards and best practices to a development engineering team in order to increase their efficiency and engagement, ultimately increasing our customers’ satisfaction.', 'Attend SalesLoft\'s New Hire Orientation, where you will learn our SalesLoft story and understand what makes our "Lofters" unique', 'Attend SalesLoft\'s New Hire Orientation, where you will learn our SalesLoft story and understand what makes our "Lofters" uniqueAttend an Engineering Department orientationBegin 1:1\'s with your manager, understand your 30-60-90 planBegin 1:1\'s with your team members and understand their career goalsMeet key players in departments that work directly with the engineering teamHave an introduction to SalesLoft’s hiring strategy and pair with your manager through the hiring process of full-stack engineersStart conducting weekly team meetings', 'You will experience joining a high-growth/high-traction organization', 'We’re redefining an age-old industry! SalesLoft is ranked #1 in the emerging category of Sales Engagement software and is on a mission to equip companies to maximize revenue by creating a fantastic buying experience.\xa0', 'At SalesLoft, our Engineering Manager is pivotal to our company’s success. ["Do you dare to reinvent the future of education? Gale, a Cengage company, partners with librarians and educators around the world to connect learners to essential content through user-friendly technology that enhances experiences and improves learning outcomes. As a Cengage employee, you'll have the opportunity to c ollaborate with the best of the best; and will feel challenged and inspired to do breakthrough work. Together, there's no limit to what we can imagine, create and innovate! Are we right for you? We set the bar higher by bringing our unique talents and points of view to the table every day. We're curious and comfortable with change and are willing to take risks to transform education for the better. We also offer a fun, challenging, and rewarding environment with opportunities to work with some of the most talented people in our industry.What You'll Do HereAs a Software Engineer on the Gale Content Conversion Management team, you’ll join a highly collaborative team that brings over 100 Gale print and digital products to life by delivering the content that students and researchers rely on. As a member of our team, you’ll provide programming analysis, development and support for processes associated with product generation, data acquisition, migration, and various other content transformations. You’ll also have the opportunity to grow and apply your knowledge as the team and company transform to meet the ever-changing needs of research and educational technology.Responsibilities Participate in the design, architecture, and implementation of product requirements.  Write high-quality software.  Follow department guidelines for version control of source code.  Develop and execute tests for all the code you write.  Create wrapper scripts that allow programs to run automatically or are easily executed by the end user. Provide user-friendly directions, script prompts, error messages and reports as needed.  Perform root cause analysis and technology evaluation.  Investigate and solve performance problems, finding ways to scale processes while containing costs.  Interface with end user to determine programming requirements and provide status updates, explanations and instructions.  Demonstrate ability to effectively communicate and encourage cross-functional participation in discussions, meetings and communications.  Demonstrate ability to break down and estimate tasks and meet agreed-upon deadlines.  Demonstrate a continuous improvement mindset regarding processes and work standards.  Foster cooperation and support, and encourage teamwork. Skills You Will Need Here Perl experience with the ability to utilize XML-aware modules and XPath.  Experience with Unix commands and shell scripting.  Python experience is also strongly preferred. ['', 'Keep your skills up to date and learn new technologies with time exploration and discovery time baked into every sprint cycle.', 'Given your experience, you will be able to problem-solve and learn/adapt quickly to our agile/scrum environment.', 'CNC Software, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.', 'We expect developers at this level to be able to take a project from start to finish and have proven experience writing an application from scratch and deploying it to users.', 'BA Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related discipline or equivalent experience.', 'Mentor and assist your other teammates.\xa0Not everybody knows everything, and as a tenured developer, you will be expected to share your expertise or technological passion.', 'Apply modern development techniques to create fault-tolerant, scalable, maintainable and automated solutions as well as write unit and integration tests for new and existing code to ensure compatibility and stability.', 'At CNC Software, Inc., our mission is to create software and services that solve the world’s manufacturing challenges. Our software, Mastercam, developed and supported by our talented team, is the most widely used CAM software in the world. Headquartered in Tolland, CT, we are a culture that embraces remote work, with over fourty percent of our team working from their home office in the United States as well as in offices in Switzerland and China. As the industry leader, we strive to innovate, and we partner with our resellers and customers to make the impossible, well, possible.', 'As a privately held, family-owned business, our culture is shaped by our concern and care for each other and our community. Our work environment reflects this care, with exceptional benefits and services you would expect of an industry leader [on-site fitness center, walking paths, employee gardens, bicycle shop, kitchen facilities] which are supported by geothermal heating/cooling and solar arrays which power the majority of our utility consumption. As a Greater Hartford Top Workplace, our focus has always been on creating a workplace that embodies the family-friendly values we hold, and which, well, doesn’t feel like “work”, but more like a place that you want to be. If you have a passion for your work, an inquisitive nature, and a pride in exceeding the expectations others have set for you – then CNC may just be the place you have been looking for.', '\xa0', 'Proven experience building new applications from the ground up, working closely with company stakeholders. Most of our applications are web applications, but we have some jobs and Azure functions as well.', 'BA Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related discipline or equivalent experience.6-9 years of experience with writing web applications with ASP.NET, C#, and JavaScript.\xa0Vue or AngularJs experience would be great, but if you’ve worked with one JavaScript UI framework, then you won’t have any problems getting up to speed.Strong verbal and written communication skills, as well as the ability to multi-task and work within the team.\xa0We are professionals through and through, but everything is easier when we are all committed to meeting deadlines and quality standards.We expect developers at this level to be able to take a project from start to finish and have proven experience writing an application from scratch and deploying it to users.Given your experience, you will be able to problem-solve and learn/adapt quickly to our agile/scrum environment.', 'The Business Systems department is responsible for various operational business applications written mostly in C#, ASP.NET, and JavaScript (AngularJs/Vue) backed by an MSSQL (Entity Framework) database.\xa0We have an automated CI/CD pipeline that deploys everything to Azure with a single click.\xa0', 'Participate in a well-defined, flexible SCRUM process, and pro-actively contribute to the estimation and planning process, demonstrating your analyzing and planning skills.', 'Work with our product owner to understand the effort required to modify our systems and participate in prototyping or technical research projects.', 'You’ll never get bored here as there is always something new to work on.\xa0At the same time, there is always something old to maintain.\xa0Part of your job will require modifying ancient VB.NET and logic in stored procedures.\xa0If that’s not for you, that is ok.\xa0We believe in doing things right the first time, and it’s no different in our recruiting efforts.\xa0Our position requires a person who appreciates the value of legacy code as we aren’t a startup anymore. In fact, we may have some code that is older than your car!\xa0', 'We are an E-Verify Employer.', '6-9 years of experience with writing web applications with ASP.NET, C#, and JavaScript.\xa0', 'EOE/M/F/Vet/Disabled are encouraged to apply.', 'Our applications are a lot of data-in/data-out web grids and forms.\xa0You won’t need to reverse a linked list or worry about the N-notation of an algorithm, implementing complicated business rules is challenging enough.\xa0', 'Position Overview:', 'Our Agile processes are mature. We try and keep unplanned work to an absolute minimum.\xa0Yes, we have meetings, but we try and keep them as short as possible.\xa0We optimize around giving developers as much focused time to code as possible.', "At CNC, we celebrate the simple solution and the maintainable system.\xa0Our team has an open mind, but we have a healthy skepticism for new, unvetted technology.\xa0To keep code quality high, we user linters, code quality standards like SOLID and DDD, perform unit/integration/e2e testing, and pull-requests. We don’t believe in death marches, emails won’t flood your inbox during the weekend, and we love it when everybody shuts down their laptop to enjoy their personal passions after they’ve put in a good day's work.", 'Be a pro-active, team player who thrives working within a team of developers and testers to build the highest quality application or solution.', 'The Software Engineer III is a senior position responsible for building a wide range of web-based line-of-business applications.\xa0This position is a full lifecycle development opportunity, enabling the employee to participate in every step of the process, from system design to deployment.\xa0This job is a full-stack position with an emphasis on back-end work.\xa0You don’t have to be a front-end expert. We keep our UIs simple.', 'Vue or AngularJs experience would be great, but if you’ve worked with one JavaScript UI framework, then you won’t have any problems getting up to speed.', 'About our Department:', 'Minimum Requirements & Qualifications:', 'Be a pro-active, team player who thrives working within a team of developers and testers to build the highest quality application or solution.Proven experience building new applications from the ground up, working closely with company stakeholders. Most of our applications are web applications, but we have some jobs and Azure functions as well.Apply modern development techniques to create fault-tolerant, scalable, maintainable and automated solutions as well as write unit and integration tests for new and existing code to ensure compatibility and stability.Participate in a well-defined, flexible SCRUM process, and pro-actively contribute to the estimation and planning process, demonstrating your analyzing and planning skills.Keep your skills up to date and learn new technologies with time exploration and discovery time baked into every sprint cycle.Work with our product owner to understand the effort required to modify our systems and participate in prototyping or technical research projects.Mentor and assist your other teammates.\xa0Not everybody knows everything, and as a tenured developer, you will be expected to share your expertise or technological passion.', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills, as well as the ability to multi-task and work within the team.\xa0We are professionals through and through, but everything is easier when we are all committed to meeting deadlines and quality standards.', 'Essential Duties & Responsibilities:']

['', '•Excellent communications skills, both oral and written, both technical and non-technical.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Additional Skills:', '\xa0•Travel will be up to 10%, primarily in the US with occasional travel outside of the US.', '•Experience with Common Language Information Services is a plus.', '•Candidate should have an appreciation of communication networks, processes and systems.', '•Participation in Industry Forums related to Common Language (e.g., TAG/IAB).', 'Key Areas of Responsibility:', '***US Citizenship required***', '•Experience with developing software tools and scripts for use in data analysis is a plus.', '•Technical support for more than one Common Language code set.', '•Working knowledge of Microsoft Excel, Word and PowerPoint.', '•End User (Customer) interface experience required.', '\xa0•Assist with special projects and other duties as assigned.', 'e ', 'Data Architect/Systems Engineer/Trainer with responsibility to maintain more than one industry standard data (Common Language code set). A significant component will be customer training in industry standard data and the software system that maintains it. The right candidate will have a high degree of personal motivation, good leadership capability, and a strong personal work ethic encompassing eagerness to expand responsibilities and a can-do attitude.', '•Ability to manage technical, business, and sensitive customer issues through clear communications.', '•Self-starter that has the ability to work with minimal oversight and has organizational skills to define, execute, track, and refine project activities.', '•Manage to tight timelines.', '•Demonstrated ability to understand customer needs and customer issues and devise solutions.', '•Exhibits relentless attention to detail.', '•Strong presentation skills are required for training and for reviewing code set evolution proposals with customers.', '• 5+ years of experience with a Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology and Informatics or 7+ years of experience in lieu of a degree.', '•Highly motivated team player.', '\ufeffRequired Skills:']

['', 'The Automation Engineer will work on a small and growing team supporting a data-intensive organization through the development of apps, tools, and packages designed to automate ETL, business practices, and intelligence products. ', 'Collaboration and team-building skills are also critical for success. ', 'INTEGRITY', 'NOTICE', 'EXCELLENCE', 'The ideal candidate will be skilled, flexible, and passionate about developing technical solutions which will directly impact US national security. ', 'The Automation Engineer will enable the use of data from an enormous variety of sources through database queries and REST API calls. ', ' The Automation Engineer will work on a small and growing team supporting a data-intensive organization through the development of apps, tools, and packages designed to automate ETL, business practices, and intelligence products.  The Automation Engineer will enable the use of data from an enormous variety of sources through database queries and REST API calls.  In addition to tool development, the candidate will have the opportunity to develop machine learning and artificial intelligence skills through close coordination with data scientists throughout the program. The Automation Engineer will be highly customer-focused and must be comfortable developing innovated solutions in an often resource-constrained classified development environment.  The ideal candidate will be skilled, flexible, and passionate about developing technical solutions which will directly impact US national security.  We are looking for the ability to rapidly prototype and test solutions with production-level quality.  Collaboration and team-building skills are also critical for success.  ', 'We are looking for the ability to rapidly prototype and test solutions with production-level quality. ', 'In addition to tool development, the candidate will have the opportunity to develop machine learning and artificial intelligence skills through close coordination with data scientists throughout the program.', 'INNOVATION', 'Core Values', 'The Automation Engineer will be highly customer-focused and must be comfortable developing innovated solutions in an often resource-constrained classified development environment. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Valiant Integrated Services is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.']

['', 'We offer:', 'You dream about ways to improve upon the status quo.', "You'll see the fruits of your labor shipped daily and you'll share in our joy as we hear back from customers, bloggers, and national media.", 'The Geographic Data Platform Team is responsible for importing and curating data about geographic locations (public records, regions, coordinates, and more) and providing services for geographic data to other teams at Redfin. We ingest data from large data providers and interface with third party services to provide high quality geographic information that powers many of the core features at Redfin. We also build tools to manage and improve that data in order to provide the highest-quality data that we can to our users. Come join us if you want to engineer robust, scalable software that will import huge quantities of data, design database architectures to store it efficiently, and then play with it to extract meaningful insights.', 'Who you are:', 'You have experience in building, deploying, and managing infrastructure in the cloud. Familiarity with AWS is a plus.', 'Redfin is revolutionizing the $75 billion real estate industry. We use data, beautiful software, and innovative design to put customers first at every step in the home-buying and selling process. Get ready to dive headfirst into our award-winning website and mobile apps, solving complex business problems in a highly visible, customer-centric way. If you value doing great work in a collaborative environment, join our team!', "When you disagree, you disagree constructively, with respect for everyone else's opinions and ideas.", 'You have mentored other engineers both technically and in their career growth.', "A mission that matters. We've helped customers buy or sell more than 235,000 homes and saved them over $632 million in fees.", 'You have architected and built robust, scalable back-end data import infrastructure that efficiently processes millions of records. Familiarity with Java, PostgreSQL, GIS, Samza, and/or Kafka is a plus.', 'More than anything, you share a passion for our mission to radically change the way people make one of the biggest decisions of their lives.', "Support and resources to continue learning, a brilliant team with which to collaborate and a commitment to your career so you can grow with the company under a management team that has experience building startups into profitable, publicly traded companies.You'll get far more responsibility than at a big company, while at the same time far less stress than you will find in a 2-person garage startup.You'll see the fruits of your labor shipped daily and you'll share in our joy as we hear back from customers, bloggers, and national media.A mission that matters. We've helped customers buy or sell more than 235,000 homes and saved them over $632 million in fees.", "You'll get far more responsibility than at a big company, while at the same time far less stress than you will find in a 2-person garage startup.", "You have at least 5+ years of industry development experience (not counting internships) under your belt.You have architected and built robust, scalable back-end data import infrastructure that efficiently processes millions of records. Familiarity with Java, PostgreSQL, GIS, Samza, and/or Kafka is a plus.You have experience in building, deploying, and managing infrastructure in the cloud. Familiarity with AWS is a plus.You have mentored other engineers both technically and in their career growth.You dream about ways to improve upon the status quo.When you disagree, you disagree constructively, with respect for everyone else's opinions and ideas.More than anything, you share a passion for our mission to radically change the way people make one of the biggest decisions of their lives.", 'Redfin is an equal opportunity employer committed to hiring a diverse workforce.', 'You have at least 5+ years of industry development experience (not counting internships) under your belt.', 'Support and resources to continue learning, a brilliant team with which to collaborate and a commitment to your career so you can grow with the company under a management team that has experience building startups into profitable, publicly traded companies.']

['', "Bachelor's Degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering", 'Experience with sensors: transducers, limit switches, thermocouples, Resistance Temperature Detector (RTD)', 'Field experience troubleshooting, integrating, and testing VME-based control systems', 'Strong familiarity with electrical/mechanical drawings', 'Responsibilities', 'This position will support maintenance and upgrade of Hull, Mechanical, & Electrical (HM&E) systems aboard Landing Platform Dock (LPD) ships.\xa0The successful candidate will develop, test, integrate, and install solutions based on LPD-17 control system requirements as well as support the Fleet in planned and emergent ship operations, troubleshooting, and test events.\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', 'Gryphon Technologies is a premier engineering and technical services provider supporting National Security programs. Gryphon is the federal Government’s partner working in support of mission critical systems in every phase of their lifecycle. We are proud of our ability to help shape tomorrow, while ensuring today’s U.S. and coalition forces can carry out their critical missions and tasks.', 'One must have good written communication, interpersonal, problem-solving, analytical, mathematical, and organizational skills. Ability to follow directions is a must. Applicants must be able to work well alone and as part of a team. A Security Clearance or the ability to obtain one will be required. U.S. Citizenship required', 'Travel up to 30%, including international travel, may be required.', 'Experience in implementing and testing algorithms in Rockwell products', 'The following experience is a plus:', 'Experience programming in C++, JAVA, Python', 'Experience with RMF', 'Understanding of protocols and interfaces such as Modbus RTU, profibus, hardware 0 to 10 volts, 4-20 mA', 'Experience with configuration management tools: GIT, Sourcesafe, clearcase', 'Experience designing and implementing solutions based on customer requirements is desired.', 'Ability to travel, including internationally', 'Experience working within engineering processes is required.', 'Field experience troubleshooting, integrating, and testing PLC-based control systems is desired.', 'Experience with Linux, Windows, and Powershell', 'Experience in reporting system and software issues', 'Ability to move up/down ladders, along narrow companionways, and lift and carry equipment and tools weighing 25 lbs.', 'Familiarity with cybersecurity practices related to software patching and updates is required.']

job_title: Software Engineer - Motion and Planning (Remote or Pittsburgh)
job_text: ['', 'Develop reliable and high-performance motion planning and decision-making software for mobile autonomous systems. Build and integrate software and algorithms for path planning, behavioral planning and vehicle control.Design and build robust and scalable codebase that enables rapid exploration and evaluation of different motion planning approaches and algorithms. Test and validate your software through unit and integration tests, simulations, and analysis of fielded performance.Guide others to develop better software practices and principles. Work with product management, a cross-functional engineering team, and quality to map development priorities to the product roadmap and deliver quality solutions to market on schedule.', 'Build and integrate software and algorithms for path planning, behavioral planning and vehicle control.', 'Experience in safety-critical applications and hard real-time constraints. ', 'Develop reliable and high-performance motion planning and decision-making software for mobile autonomous systems. ', 'Experience in data structures and advanced algorithms', 'Guide others to develop better software practices and principles. ', 'Modern C++ development experience in a Unix/Linux environment. ', 'Experience in robotics development in motion planning and control (e.g., trajectory optimization, planning under uncertainty, probabilistic robotics, optimal control, guidance, navigation and control, etc.).', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills. ', 'Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Robotics, or relevant field. ', 'Understanding of kinematic and dynamic vehicle models', '2-5 years of software development experience. ', 'Experience implementing scalable and maintainable software design patterns.', 'Work with product management, a cross-functional engineering team, and quality to map development priorities to the product roadmap and deliver quality solutions to market on schedule.', 'Practical knowledge of software engineering principles including software design, source control management, build processes, code reviews, testing methods. ', 'Flexible and creative thinking. ', 'Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Robotics, or relevant field. 2-5 years of software development experience. Modern C++ development experience in a Unix/Linux environment. Experience in robotics development in motion planning and control (e.g., trajectory optimization, planning under uncertainty, probabilistic robotics, optimal control, guidance, navigation and control, etc.).Understanding of kinematic and dynamic vehicle modelsExperience in data structures and advanced algorithmsPractical knowledge of software engineering principles including software design, source control management, build processes, code reviews, testing methods. Experience implementing scalable and maintainable software design patterns.Experience in safety-critical applications and hard real-time constraints. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to learn. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Flexible and creative thinking. ', 'Strong problem-solving skills and ability to learn. ', 'Test and validate your software through unit and integration tests, simulations, and analysis of fielded performance.', 'Design and build robust and scalable codebase that enables rapid exploration and evaluation of different motion planning approaches and algorithms. ']

& Responsibilities', '\xa0Experience of PAM with CyberArk or Hashicorp Vault', "More than a name, Neverfail is a belief that is core to our DNA. job_text: ['', ' Serves as a Tier-III support for the team, engaging other team resources as necessary and as defined by support processes. ', '  Technical Foundation  : Beginners to intermediate technical concepts including, but not limited to, Linux, AD, MFA, firewall, IPS, APT Detection, and networking, hardware, software, interfaces, operating systems, and others as deem necessary by the Infrastructure Security Manager. ', ' Must be able to perform the professional, clinical, and technical competencies of the assigned unit or department. ', '  Systems Analysis and Design  : Ability to perform Tier-II to Tier-III level analysis while reviewing security logs. Utilizes technical knowledge to ask relevant questions during systems analysis so that security is injected at the start of any project. Performs other reasonably related duties as assigned. ', ' Expert knowledge of firewalls, IPS, access control, monitoring, design tools, encryption denial of service prevention mechanisms. ', '  System Support  : Maintain support for all infrastructure security systems, making sure logs are being received on the security incident and event monitoring system. Monitor health of all infrastructure security systems to make sure they are running, functional, and generating security events. Assist and mentor the Enterprise Cybersecurity Engineer I and II when needed. ', ' Encryption and key management technologies ', 'Required', ' Mobile technologies ', ' Experience with peripheral component interconnect and other security audit processes, evidence gathering and development/management of remediation plans used in resolution of findings ', ' Demonstrated effective verbal and written communication and presentation skills ', 'Responsibilities', '  Troubleshooting  : Intermediate to advance problem solving skills and capabilities to resolve infrastructure security applications, user account, and security server issues under stressful conditions. Uses appropriate methods of escalation to both internal and external resources to the Infrastructure Security Manager when needed. ', ' System Updates ', ' Knowledge in CSF ', ' System Documentation ', '  System Documentation  : Maintains documentation on the infrastructure security systems technical configuration, contacts and functionality. Maintains relevant training materials for the infrastructure security systems. Assist and mentor the Enterprise Cybersecurity Engineer I and II when needed. ', '  System Updates  : Responsibilities include planning and scheduling system patches, upgrades, and updates. This also includes coordination with team members, Identity and Access Management Analyst/Engineers, other HITS teams, vendors, users, interfaces, and other systems that feed or accept information from the infrastructure security system. This would include all IAM servers. Follows department change request processes. ', '  System Backup/Recovery  : Verifies that the Infrastructure Security systems are completing a normally scheduled and approved backup methodology. Verifies that systems/data can be restored in the event of a failure or disaster. This will include the completion of disaster recovery plans (DRP) and other documentation related to disaster recovery (DR) and high availability (HA). Assist and mentor the Enterprise Cybersecurity Engineer I and II when needed. ', ' Systems/Application Knowledge ', ' CISSP, CEH, CISA, CISM, GCPM, GSNA, GCFA, GAWN, GXPN, GREM, or GSE ', ' Qualifications ', ' System Backup/Recovery ', ' Complete understanding of the C.I.A model ', ' Reporting ', ' Malware hunting, forensic, reverse engineering of malware, and mitigation ', ' Advance Data Loss Protection technologies ', ' Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science (Any Discipline) or minimum of 7-12 years Information Security experience  Expert knowledge of firewalls, IPS, access control, monitoring, design tools, encryption denial of service prevention mechanisms.  Complete understanding of the C.I.A model  Knowledge in CSF  Mobile technologies  Encryption and key management technologies  Malware hunting, forensic, reverse engineering of malware, and mitigation  Advance Data Loss Protection technologies  Experience with peripheral component interconnect and other security audit processes, evidence gathering and development/management of remediation plans used in resolution of findings  Knowledge of risk management processes, including steps and methods for assessing risk  Ability to translate technical concepts into business and capability terminology  Exceptional collaboration ability; substantial experience as a senior-level negotiator  Ability to interact effectively with Leadership when needed  Demonstrated effective verbal and written communication and presentation skills  Demonstrated proficiency in basic computer applications, such as Microsoft Office software products.  Ability to travel for training and business ', '  Systems/Application Knowledge  : Infrastructure security systems and application knowledge and will be mentored by the Infrastructure Security Manager. ', ' Functions as a coordination point for issues related to infrastructure security systems between all HIT teams. ', 'Position Summary/Career Interest', '  System Integrity/Retention  : Requires verification of security systems application logs and other monitoring tools to resolve issues that could cause issues on HITS servers or medical devices. CISSP, CEH, CISA, CISM, GCPM, GSNA, GCFA, GAWN, GXPN, GREM, or GSE  Extensive knowledge of HITRUST CSF', ' Ability to travel for training and business ', ' Data Entry ', ' Ability to interact effectively with Leadership when needed ', '  Reporting  : Ability to use infrastructure security application functionality to create, schedule, distribute, and print reports as need or on a set routine for the Infrastructure Security Manager. ', ' Demonstrated proficiency in basic computer applications, such as Microsoft Office software products. ', ' Knowledge of risk management processes, including steps and methods for assessing risk ', ' System Security ', '  Data Entry  : Maintain knowledge of infrastructure security applications and functional areas as it pertains to data and network security. ', ' Troubleshooting ', '  System Security  : Protects hospital assets and information by maintaining secure systems. Follows organizational policies and processes surrounding access management, regulatory compliance, systems architecture, disaster recovery, vendor management, and others to support security and integrity of organizational and patient data. ', ' Must be able to perform the professional, clinical, and technical competencies of the assigned unit or department.  Serves as a Tier-III support for the team, engaging other team resources as necessary and as defined by support processes.  Functions as a coordination point for issues related to infrastructure security systems between all HIT teams. Act as an escalation point for issues with assigned infrastructure systems that cannot be resolved in the Service Desk or by the Enterprise Cybersecurity Engineer I and II.   System Support  : Maintain support for all infrastructure security systems, making sure logs are being received on the security incident and event monitoring system. Monitor health of all infrastructure security systems to make sure they are running, functional, and generating security events. Assist and mentor the Enterprise Cybersecurity Engineer I and II when needed.   System Documentation  : Maintains documentation on the infrastructure security systems technical configuration, contacts and functionality. Contributes and maintains common troubleshooting tips in the designated knowledge base. Keeps current vendor and system data owner’s contact information in the designated location. Maintains relevant training materials for the infrastructure security systems. Assist and mentor the Enterprise Cybersecurity Engineer I and II when needed.   System Updates  : Responsibilities include planning and scheduling system patches, upgrades, and updates. This also includes coordination with team members, Identity and Access Management Analyst/Engineers, other HITS teams, vendors, users, interfaces, and other systems that feed or accept information from the infrastructure security system. This would include all IAM servers. Follows department change request processes.   System Security  : Protects hospital assets and information by maintaining secure systems. Follows organizational policies and processes surrounding access management, regulatory compliance, systems architecture, disaster recovery, vendor management, and others to support security and integrity of organizational and patient data.   System Integrity/Retention  : Requires verification of security systems application logs and other monitoring tools to resolve issues that could cause issues on HITS servers or medical devices. Ensure retention periods for Enterprise Cybersecurity team’s data follow hospital and regulatory requirements. Assist and mentor the Enterprise Cybersecurity Engineer I and II when needed.   System Backup/Recovery  : Verifies that the Infrastructure Security systems are completing a normally scheduled and approved backup methodology. Verifies that systems/data can be restored in the event of a failure or disaster. This will include the completion of disaster recovery plans (DRP) and other documentation related to disaster recovery (DR) and high availability (HA). Assist and mentor the Enterprise Cybersecurity Engineer I and II when needed.   Data Entry  : Maintain knowledge of infrastructure security applications and functional areas as it pertains to data and network security.   Reporting  : Ability to use infrastructure security application functionality to create, schedule, distribute, and print reports as need or on a set routine for the Infrastructure Security Manager.   Interfaces  : Monitor and support infrastructure security system interfaces in conjunction with dedicated interface staff and other teams. Maintain documentation surrounding the flow of data between systems.   Troubleshooting  : Intermediate to advance problem solving skills and capabilities to resolve infrastructure security applications, user account, and security server issues under stressful conditions. Uses appropriate methods of escalation to both internal and external resources to the Infrastructure Security Manager when needed.   Systems/Application Knowledge  : Infrastructure security systems and application knowledge and will be mentored by the Infrastructure Security Manager.   Vendor Management  : Communicates effectively with infrastructure security system vendors to maintain working relationships and proper systems support. Verifies vendor actions meet the expectations of the hospital.   Technical Foundation  : Beginners to intermediate technical concepts including, but not limited to, Linux, AD, MFA, firewall, IPS, APT Detection, and networking, hardware, software, interfaces, operating systems, and others as deem necessary by the Infrastructure Security Manager.   Systems Analysis and Design  : Ability to perform Tier-II to Tier-III level analysis while reviewing security logs. Utilizes technical knowledge to ask relevant questions during systems analysis so that security is injected at the start of any project. Performs other reasonably related duties as assigned. ', ' Systems Analysis and Design ', '  Interfaces  : Monitor and support infrastructure security system interfaces in conjunction with dedicated interface staff and other teams. Maintain documentation surrounding the flow of data between systems. ']

['', 'What You’ll Do', 'Who are we?', 'Requirements', 'Nice To Have', 'Our Company', "Who are we?At Marketo an Adobe Company, we are creating the world’s leading engagement platform that empowers marketers to deliver the authentic experiences customers desire at scale. We are fueled by a real passion for innovation, growth, and a committed dedication to making the marketer successful. We hire dynamic, passionate, and innovative individuals who thrive in fast-paced environments.Looking for an organized, dedicated Quality Assurance Engineer to join our team.Our team tests some of the most innovative products being developed at our company. Our area of expertise covers products from Machine Learning and AI to real-time personalization and analytics. Our team is very dynamic and hands-on and we utilize the latest technologies as well as our analytic skills. If you want to be a part of a team that challenges your abilities and is diverse, tight-knit and adaptable and will make you feel at home with its great atmosphere – Your place is with us!What You’ll DoFeature, patch and release testing of our company's applications in the company's SaaS environment. Find innovative ways to test groundbreaking products. Write and execute complicated plans for defining and improving quality metrics. Build, maintain and execute automation scripts for functional, regression, loading and stress testing Set up CI/CD tools as part of the engineering efforts.Requirements2 years of proven work experience in application quality assurance (Web/SaaS) Knowledge of Linux systems. Programming experience in Java and any other programming languages (Javascript, Python, Shell, etc) Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugsExperience in writing clear test plans and QA methodologiesTeam Player with good interpersonal and communication skills, highly motivated Strong technical skills, ability to deep dive into complex problems & find their root cause Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent experienceNice To HaveKnowledge with databases: SQL, MongoDB, Redis Experience in distributed systems Experience with Selenium WebDriver Experience with testing large, scalable systems Experience working with Jenkins or other CI/CD frameworks. Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process"]

['', "As a software engineer, you'll work on small teams to develop the products and features that make Kin operate. We're a Ruby on Rails environment with Javascript front-end and PostgreSQL database, and we apply Agile methodologies to our product and software development processes. In your role, you will have the opportunity to work on features and products in a collaborative engineering environment where you can work closely with peers as well as cross-functionally.", 'Disability insurance', '2+ years of professional software engineering experience', '2+ years of professional software engineering experienceProficiency coding in RubyComfortable in a startup environment – we’re fast-paced, self-motivated, and determined to change the industryA fast learner, ready to bring previous knowledge to this position and continue developing along the way', 'I’ve Got Skills, But Do I Have the Necessary Ones?', 'Dental', 'Being in the insurance industry, we recognize the importance of comprehensive benefits for you and your family. That’s why we provide a variety of options and coverage levels to customize a plan that fits your needs. These are just some of the benefits and perks we offer:\xa0', 'Kin Insurance exists to change home insurance from what it is to what it should be. We do this by applying data science and analytics to make decisions, automation to reduce redundancies and unnecessary costs, and innovative thinking to change the way customers interact with and get value from their home insurance provider. ['', 'We offer a competitive salary along with exceptional benefits such as:', 'SUPERIVISORY REQUIREMENTS', 'POSITION TYPE ', 'State-of-the-Art Wellness Center at Corporate Headquarters', 'EEO STATEMENT', 'TRAVEL', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with both Object Oriented and Functional programming paradigms', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years of experience building large scale data pipelines, designing cloud architectures, working with scientists who work in various reporting and analytics capacities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working with Snowflake data warehouses', 'We are looking for a passionate and experienced Sr. Data Engineer to join the ML and Analytics team at\xa0Orangetheory® Fitness. This is a senior position perfect for an experienced data engineer looking for an opportunity to join a leader in the fitness franchise industry. If you are keen on getting in on projects on the ground floor, helping define the architecture and ETL pipelines for the movement of large amounts of data, and enabling the end to end deployment of complex ML pipelines, this is the team for you.\xa0The Sr. Data Engineer will use a breadth of knowledge to deliver highly available, scalable and cost-effective data architectures. You will demonstrate a comfort with ambiguity and play the role of a technical leader, guiding simple yet creative solutions to complex problems. The end-to-end analytics enabled by this role will be critical in drawing insight from large and complex data sets and\xa0using these insights to drive analytical thinking at all levels of the company.', 'This position is expected to provide technical mentorship to all levels of the Analytics organization. Additionally, this role will supervise incoming entry level Data Engineers.', 'PREFERRED SKILLS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience writing highly optimized and efficient SQL', 'SUMMARY/OBJECTIVE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Create an environment that allows for the exploration and exploitation of our rich datasets', 'ACCOUNTABILITIES', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Make data more available', 'Orangetheory Fitness provides equal employment opportunity to all individuals regardless of their race, color, creed, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by state, federal, or local law.\xa0Discrimination of any type will not be tolerated.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Continuous integration, automation, change control, as well as scalable and performant designs', 'Paid Time Off', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years of experience working in an AWS heavy environment and a breadth of knowledge and familiarity with core AWS storage and data pipelining services. (Redshift, EMR, RDS, Glue, Kinesis, Dynamo DB, Firehose)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working in a big data environment, moving large amounts of data through complex pipelines', 'Team Building, Employee Engagement activities and so much more', ' This is a Full-Time position', 'Orangetheory® Fitness is one of the fastest-growing global fitness franchises with studios located throughout the United States as well as internationally.\xa0We are a scientifically designed, one-of-a-kind, group personal training workout broken into intervals of cardiovascular and strength training. Led by highly skilled coaches, each Orangetheory Fitness workout incorporates endurance, strength, and power elements through a variety of equipment including treadmills, rowing machines, TRX® suspension training and free weights.\xa0\xa0We have over 1,200 locations open in the United States and currently operate 150+ International studios in 23 countries with more than 400 new fitness studios under development across the nation and internationally.', '\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Interpret requirements from the business analysis and data science teams to deliver optimal solutions', 'Free workouts at corporate studios', 'Parental Leave Pay', 'Healthcare Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision among many other supplemental benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Implement and maintain highly available and stable data ingestion pipelines using industry standard ETL/ELT best practices', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience executing spark jobs through YARN on EMR clusters', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide mentorship and thought partnership to data engineers, scientists and analyst across the analytics organization', '401k Plan with Employer Contribution', ' ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Guide the constant improvement of the analytics data ingestion and routing mechanism and ensure that the systems stay current and up to date', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate closely with ML scientists and BI engineers/analysts to facilitate fast and efficient algorithm development', '\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in a quant/tech field like Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Statistics', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa03+ years of experience working in Python', ' This position does not require travel; however, travel may be required for training initiatives and/or visits to collaborate with business partners on rare occasions.', 'Holiday Pay', 'REQUIREMENTS & SKILLS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0High level understanding and knowledge of core statistical and data science concepts are a plus', 'WHY JOIN ORANGETHEORY CORPORATE?', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa02+ years of experience with PySpark including experience interfacing with a wide variety of data sources and targets using PySpark', 'Employer Paid Benefits: Long-Term Disability and Life Insurance', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Quickly identify weaknesses, data integrity lapses and bugs in our data ingestion pipelines and remedy them', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with the standard software development lifecycle including code reviews, source control management, CI/CD etc.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Backend – Member Experience
job_text: ['', 'Passion, collaboration, and productivity in a dynamic cross-functional team environment.', '3+ years’ experience developing API services for consumer mobile and/or web applications or enterprise SaaS.', 'Our Work Truly Matters', 'Experience implementing REST APIs and highly scalable systems. Experience with event-driven architecture in a Microservices environment is a plus.', 'Team events and social gatherings', 'Make an Impact', 'What makes a Senior Software Engineer at Livongo different?', '7+ years’ experience in software engineering in a functional object-oriented language (Scala preferred, Java or Python).', 'Employee Referral Bonus Program', 'Competitive compensation packages', 'An endless variety of healthy snacks and beverages to fuel your creativity', 'Provide the full line of Livongo programs and services to all employees and their families', ' Competitive compensation packages Comprehensive medical, dental, vision and 401K Generous PTO policy 10 paid holidays each year Lunch provided Monday through Thursday (in office) An endless variety of healthy snacks and beverages to fuel your creativity Employee Stock Purchase Plan Employee Referral Bonus Program Team events and social gatherings Pet-friendly environment in Mountain View, CA and Denver Diabetes Care Prescription Reimbursement Discount/Subsidy program for gym membership Provide the full line of Livongo programs and services to all employees and their families ', 'Our Benefits Include', 'Best Places to Work', 'Lead projects for the team including grooming and sizing requirements, designing solutions, defining project plans and go to market strategy, and mentoring and coaching junior engineers.', 'Take ownership of our cloud APIs and services that connect biometric and clinical data across multiple health platforms, allow doctors and coaches to provide patient care via seamless access to Livongo, and deliver data-science powered care and advice to users.', 'Generous PTO policy', ' As a senior member of the Member Experience Backend team, you will lead building the backend microservices to power our consumer facing applications across mobile, web, and smart health devices. Partner with product managers, user experience designers, mobile and web front end engineers, and data scientists to support the full product lifecycle. Take ownership of our cloud APIs and services that connect biometric and clinical data across multiple health platforms, allow doctors and coaches to provide patient care via seamless access to Livongo, and deliver data-science powered care and advice to users. Lead projects for the team including grooming and sizing requirements, designing solutions, defining project plans and go to market strategy, and mentoring and coaching junior engineers. Harness state of the art technologies such as Scala, AWS, Play, gRPC, Protobuf, Kubernetes, Spark, Kafka, Microservices, MySQL, ElasticSearch, Flyway, FHIR, OAuth. ', 'Diabetes Care Prescription Reimbursement', 'Discount/Subsidy program for gym membership', 'Experience designing and optimizing relational databases, such as MySQL. Experience with ETL or AWS Redshift a plus.', 'Candidate Profile', 'Comprehensive medical, dental, vision and 401K', 'Lunch provided Monday through Thursday (in office)', 'Employee Stock Purchase Plan', 'The Opportunity', '10 paid holidays each year', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills.', 'Growth and Innovation', 'Diversity and Inclusion', ' BS degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field. In lieu of degree, relevant work experience and/or trade school is acceptable. 7+ years’ experience in software engineering in a functional object-oriented language (Scala preferred, Java or Python). 3+ years’ experience developing API services for consumer mobile and/or web applications or enterprise SaaS. Experience implementing REST APIs and highly scalable systems. Experience with event-driven architecture in a Microservices environment is a plus. Experience designing and optimizing relational databases, such as MySQL. Experience with ETL or AWS Redshift a plus. Passion, collaboration, and productivity in a dynamic cross-functional team environment. Strong written and verbal communication skills. ', 'As a senior member of the Member Experience Backend team, you will lead building the backend microservices to power our consumer facing applications across mobile, web, and smart health devices.', 'Partner with product managers, user experience designers, mobile and web front end engineers, and data scientists to support the full product lifecycle.', 'BS degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field. In lieu of degree, relevant work experience and/or trade school is acceptable.', 'Why Join Livongo?', 'Pet-friendly environment in Mountain View, CA and Denver', 'Harness state of the art technologies such as Scala, AWS, Play, gRPC, Protobuf, Kubernetes, Spark, Kafka, Microservices, MySQL, ElasticSearch, Flyway, FHIR, OAuth.', 'Focus on PEOPLE']
